diff.citg.c
diff.citg.w
df-mbf
blocks.content: Define the class of measurable functions on the reals. A real function is measurable if the preimage of every open interval is a measurable set (see ~ ismbl ) and a complex function is measurable if the real and imaginary parts of the function is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: df-itg1
blocks.content: Define the Lebesgue integral for simple functions. A simple function is a finite linear combination of indicator functions for finitely measurable sets, whose assigned value is the sum of the measures of the sets times their respective weights. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: df-itg2
blocks.content: Define the Lebesgue integral for nonnegative functions. A nonnegative function's integral is the supremum of the integrals of all simple functions that are less than the input function. Note that this may be ` +oo ` for functions that take the value ` +oo ` on a set of positive measure or functions that are bounded below by a positive number on a set of infinite measure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: df-ibl
blocks.content: Define the class of integrable functions on the reals. A function is integrable if it is measurable and the integrals of the pieces of the function are all finite. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ibl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cibl, crab(s0, cmbf, wral(s1, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s2, cr, csb(s3, cfv(cre, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))), cif(cv(s3), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cdm(cv(s0))), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s3))))))), cr))))
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-itg
blocks.content: Define the full Lebesgue integral, for complex-valued functions to ` RR ` . The syntax is designed to be suggestive of the standard notation for integrals. For example, our notation for the integral of ` x ^ 2 ` from ` 0 ` to ` 1 ` is ` S. ( 0 [,] 1 ) ( x ^ 2 ) _d x = ( 1 / 3 ) ` . The only real function of this definition is to break the integral up into nonnegative real parts and send it off to ~ df-itg2 for further processing. Note that this definition cannot handle integrals which evaluate to infinity, because addition and multiplication are not currently defined on extended reals. (You can use ~ df-itg2 directly for this use-case.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-itg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, csb(s2, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))), cif(cv(s2), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s2))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
}

blocks.name: ismbf1
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a measurable function". This is more naturally stated for functions on the reals, see ~ ismbf and ~ ismbfcn for the decomposition of the real and imaginary parts. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismbf1(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cmbf), wa(wcel(c0, co(cc, cpm, cr)), wral(s0, crn(cioo), wa(wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, c0)), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cmbf, co(cc, cpm, cr), wral(s0, crn(cioo), wa(wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, c0)), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)))), wral(s0, crn(cioo), wa(wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)))))
  ralbidv(s0, crn(cioo), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol))), wa(wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, c0)), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, c0)), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol), cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq1d(ccnv(ccom(cre, cv(hs0))), cv(s0), ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  cnveqd(ccom(cre, cv(hs0)), ccom(cre, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  coeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cre)
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol), cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, c0)), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq1d(ccnv(ccom(cim, cv(hs0))), cv(s0), ccnv(ccom(cim, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  cnveqd(ccom(cim, cv(hs0)), ccom(cim, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  coeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cim)
  df-mbf(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cc, cpm, cr))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, crn(cioo), wa(wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, c0)), cv(s0)), cdm(cvol)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ismbf1(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ MblFn ↔(c0 ∈(ℂ[p↦]ℝ)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ran((,)),((`'(Re ∘ c0)" s0)∈ dom(vol)∧(`'(Im ∘ c0)" s0)∈ dom(vol)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cmbf, (ℂ[p↦]ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ ran((,)),((`'(Re ∘ c0)" s0)∈ dom(vol)∧(`'(Im ∘ c0)" s0)∈ dom(vol))), ∀(s0 ∈ ran((,)),((`'(Re ∘ hs0)" s0)∈ dom(vol)∧(`'(Im ∘ hs0)" s0)∈ dom(vol))))
  ralbidv(s0, ran((,)), hs0 = c0, ((`'(Re ∘ hs0)" s0)∈ dom(vol)∧(`'(Im ∘ hs0)" s0)∈ dom(vol)), ((`'(Re ∘ c0)" s0)∈ dom(vol)∧(`'(Im ∘ c0)" s0)∈ dom(vol)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (`'(Re ∘ hs0)" s0)∈ dom(vol), (`'(Im ∘ hs0)" s0)∈ dom(vol), (`'(Re ∘ c0)" s0)∈ dom(vol), (`'(Im ∘ c0)" s0)∈ dom(vol))
  eleq1d((`'(Re ∘ hs0)" s0), dom(vol), (`'(Re ∘ c0)" s0), hs0 = c0)
  imaeq1d(`'(Re ∘ hs0), s0, `'(Re ∘ c0), hs0 = c0)
  cnveqd((Re ∘ hs0), (Re ∘ c0), hs0 = c0)
  coeq2(hs0, c0, cre)
  eleq1d((`'(Im ∘ hs0)" s0), dom(vol), (`'(Im ∘ c0)" s0), hs0 = c0)
  imaeq1d(`'(Im ∘ hs0), s0, `'(Im ∘ c0), hs0 = c0)
  cnveqd((Im ∘ hs0), (Im ∘ c0), hs0 = c0)
  coeq2(hs0, c0, cim)
  df-mbf(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ ran((,)),((`'(Re ∘ c0)" s0)∈ dom(vol)∧(`'(Im ∘ c0)" s0)∈ dom(vol))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: mbff
blocks.content: A measurable function is a function into the complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: mbfdm
blocks.content: The domain of a measurable function is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mbfdm(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cdm(c0), cdm(cvol)))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cdm(c0), cdm(cvol), cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cr), wcel(c0, cmbf))
  syl(wcel(c0, cmbf), wceq(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cr), cdm(c0)), wf(ccom(cre, c0), cdm(c0), cr))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cmbf), wf(ccom(cre, c0), cdm(c0), cr), wf(cre, cc, cr), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cc))
  ref()
  mbff(c0)
  fco(cre, cc, cr, c0, cdm(c0))
  fimacnv(ccom(cre, c0), cdm(c0), cr)
  rspcdva(hs0, cr, crn(cioo), wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cr), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol)))
  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol), cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cr), wceq(cv(hs0), cr))
  imaeq2(cv(hs0), cr, ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)))
  simplbiim(wcel(c0, cmbf), wral(hs0, crn(cioo), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol))), wcel(c0, co(cc, cpm, cr)), wral(hs0, crn(cioo), wa(wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, c0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol)))))
  ismbf1(hs0, c0)
  ralimi(hs0, crn(cioo), wa(wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, c0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol))), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol)))
  simpl(wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, c0)), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cr, crn(cioo)))
  eqeltrri(cr, crn(cioo), co(cmnf, cioo, cpnf))
  ioomax()
  mp3an(wcel(co(cmnf, cioo, cpnf), crn(cioo)), wfn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr)), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  ax-mp(wfn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr)), wf(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr)))
  ioof()
  ffn(cioo, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cr))
  mnfxr()
  pnfxr()
  fnovrn(cioo, cxr, cxr, cmnf, cpnf)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cioo))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, c0)), cr), cdm(cvol)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mbfdm(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ MblFn → dom(c0)∈ dom(vol))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(dom(c0), dom(vol), (`'(Re ∘ c0)" ℝ), c0 ∈ MblFn)
  syl(c0 ∈ MblFn, (`'(Re ∘ c0)" ℝ)= dom(c0), ((Re ∘ c0): dom(c0)→ ℝ))
  sylancr(c0 ∈ MblFn, ((Re ∘ c0): dom(c0)→ ℝ), (Re : ℂ → ℝ), (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℂ))
  ref()
  mbff(c0)
  fco(cre, cc, cr, c0, dom(c0))
  fimacnv((Re ∘ c0), dom(c0), cr)
  rspcdva(hs0, cr, ran((,)), c0 ∈ MblFn, (`'(Re ∘ c0)" ℝ)∈ dom(vol), (`'(Re ∘ c0)" hs0)∈ dom(vol))
  eleq1d((`'(Re ∘ c0)" hs0), dom(vol), (`'(Re ∘ c0)" ℝ), hs0 = ℝ)
  imaeq2(hs0, cr, `'(Re ∘ c0))
  simplbiim(c0 ∈ MblFn, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((,)),(`'(Re ∘ c0)" hs0)∈ dom(vol)), c0 ∈(ℂ[p↦]ℝ), ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((,)),((`'(Re ∘ c0)" hs0)∈ dom(vol)∧(`'(Im ∘ c0)" hs0)∈ dom(vol))))
  ismbf1(hs0, c0)
  ralimi(hs0, ran((,)), ((`'(Re ∘ c0)" hs0)∈ dom(vol)∧(`'(Im ∘ c0)" hs0)∈ dom(vol)), (`'(Re ∘ c0)" hs0)∈ dom(vol))
  simpl((`'(Re ∘ c0)" hs0)∈ dom(vol), (`'(Im ∘ c0)" hs0)∈ dom(vol))
  a1i(c0 ∈ MblFn, ℝ ∈ ran((,)))
  eqeltrri(cr, ran((,)), (-∞[(,)]+∞))
  ioomax()
  mp3an((-∞[(,)]+∞)∈ ran((,)), (,)[Fn](ℝ* × ℝ*), -∞ ∈ ℝ*, +∞ ∈ ℝ*)
  ax-mp((,)[Fn](ℝ* × ℝ*), ((,):(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ)))
  ioof()
  ffn(cioo, (ℝ* × ℝ*), P(ℝ))
  mnfxr()
  pnfxr()
  fnovrn(cioo, cxr, cxr, cmnf, cpnf)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(ran((,)))
  diff.hs0.w((`'(Re ∘ c0)" ℝ)∈ dom(vol))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: mbfconstlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ mbfconst and related theorems. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mbfconstlem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2), cdm(cvol)))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2), cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, c2))
  eqeltrd(cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2), cdm(cvol), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqtrd(cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2), c0, cdm(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqssd(cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2), cdm(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2), cdm(cxp(c0, csn(c1)))))
  cnvimass(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c2)
  syl5eqssr(cdm(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2), cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), crn(cxp(c0, csn(c1)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  cnvimarndm(cxp(c0, csn(c1)))
  3syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), crn(cxp(c0, csn(c1)))), cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2)), wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, c2), wss(crn(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c1, c2), wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, c2))
  fconst6g(c1, c2, c0)
  frn(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, c2)
  imass2(crn(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2, ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))))
  fdmd(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, csn(c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c1, c2)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c1, c2), wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, csn(c1)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c1, c2))
  syl6eqel(cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2), cdm(cvol), emptycls, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wcel(c1, c2))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wcel(c1, c2))), wceq(cima(ccnv(cxp(c0, csn(c1))), c2), emptycls), wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, csn(c1)), wceq(cin(csn(c1), c2), emptycls))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr), wn(wcel(c1, c2)), wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, csn(c1)))
  fconstg(c1, cr, c0)
  syl5eq(cin(csn(c1), c2), emptycls, cin(c2, csn(c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wcel(c1, c2))))
  incom(csn(c1), c2)
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wcel(c1, c2))), wceq(cin(c2, csn(c1)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)), wcel(c1, cr)), wn(wcel(c1, c2)))
  disjsn(c2, c1)
  fimacnvdisj(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, csn(c1), c2)
  0mbl()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mbfconstlem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)→(`'(c0 × { c1 })" c2)∈ dom(vol))
} = {
  pm2.61dan((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), (`'(c0 × { c1 })" c2)∈ dom(vol), c1 ∈ c2)
  eqeltrd((`'(c0 × { c1 })" c2), dom(vol), c0, ((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  eqtrd((`'(c0 × { c1 })" c2), c0, dom((c0 × { c1 })), ((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  eqssd((`'(c0 × { c1 })" c2), dom((c0 × { c1 })), ((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  a1i(((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ c2), (`'(c0 × { c1 })" c2)⊆ dom((c0 × { c1 })))
  cnvimass((c0 × { c1 }), c2)
  syl5eqssr(dom((c0 × { c1 })), (`'(c0 × { c1 })" c2), (`'(c0 × { c1 })" ran((c0 × { c1 }))), ((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  cnvimarndm((c0 × { c1 }))
  3syl(((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ c2), (`'(c0 × { c1 })" ran((c0 × { c1 })))⊆(`'(c0 × { c1 })" c2), ((c0 × { c1 }): c0 → c2), ran((c0 × { c1 }))⊆ c2)
  adantl((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), c1 ∈ c2, ((c0 × { c1 }): c0 → c2))
  fconst6g(c1, c2, c0)
  frn((c0 × { c1 }), c0, c2)
  imass2(ran((c0 × { c1 })), c2, `'(c0 × { c1 }))
  fdmd((c0 × { c1 }), c0, { c1 }, ((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ dom(vol), c1 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ c2, ((c0 × { c1 }): c0 → { c1 }))
  simpll(c0 ∈ dom(vol), c1 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ c2)
  syl6eqel((`'(c0 × { c1 })" c2), dom(vol), emptycls, ((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)∧ ¬ c1 ∈ c2))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)∧ ¬ c1 ∈ c2), (`'(c0 × { c1 })" c2)= ∅, ((c0 × { c1 }): c0 → { c1 }), ({ c1 } ⋂ c2)= ∅)

blocks.name: ismbf
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a measurable function". A function is measurable iff the preimages of all open intervals are measurable sets in the sense of ~ ismbl . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: ismbfcn
blocks.content: A complex function is measurable iff the real and imaginary components of the function are measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)

thm ismbfcn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, c1, cc), wb(wcel(c0, cmbf), wa(wcel(ccom(cre, c0), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, c0), cmbf))))

  pm5.21ndd(wf(c0, c1, cc), wcel(c0, cmbf), wa(wcel(ccom(cre, c0), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, c0), cmbf)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)))
  syl5ib(wf(c0, c1, cc), wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wcel(cdm(c0), cdm(cvol)))
  mbfdm(c0)
  eleq1d(cdm(c0), cdm(cvol), c1, wf(c0, c1, cc))
  fdm(c0, c1, cc)

blocks.name: mbfima
blocks.content: Definitional property of a measurable function: the preimage of an open right-unbounded interval is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  eleq1d(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(cvol), cima(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(c2, cioo, c3)))

  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cmbf), wf(c0, c1, cr)), wcel(cun(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, c2)), cima(ccnv(c0), co(c3, cioo, cpnf))), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, c2)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(c3, cioo, cpnf)), cdm(cvol)))
  mbfima(c0, c1, cmnf, c2)
  mbfima(c0, c1, c3, cpnf)
  unmbl(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, c2)), cima(ccnv(c0), co(c3, cioo, cpnf)))
  difmbl(cima(ccnv(c0), cr), cima(ccnv(c0), cun(co(cmnf, cioo, c2), co(c3, cioo, cpnf))))
}

thm mbfconst(class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), (c0 × { c1 })∈ MblFn, (c0 × { c1 })∈(ℂ[p↦]ℝ), ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((,)),((`'(Re ∘(c0 × { c1 }))" hs0)∈ dom(vol)∧(`'(Im ∘(c0 × { c1 }))" hs0)∈ dom(vol))))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), (c0 × { c1 })∈(ℂ[p↦]ℝ), ((c0 × { c1 }): c0 → ℂ), c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  fmptd(hs1, (c0 × { c1 }), c0, cc, c1, (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  adantr(c0 ∈ dom(vol), c1 ∈ ℂ, c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  mblss(c0)
  mpanl12((((c0 × { c1 }): c0 → ℂ)∧ c0 ⊆ ℝ), (c0 × { c1 })∈(ℂ[p↦]ℝ), ℂ ∈ 𝕌, ℝ ∈ 𝕌)
  cnex()
  reex()
  elpm2r(cc, universe, cr, universe, (c0 × { c1 }), c0)
  ralrimivw(hs0, ran((,)), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), ((`'(Re ∘(c0 × { c1 }))" hs0)∈ dom(vol)∧(`'(Im ∘(c0 × { c1 }))" hs0)∈ dom(vol)))
  jca((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), (`'(Re ∘(c0 × { c1 }))" hs0)∈ dom(vol), (`'(Im ∘(c0 × { c1 }))" hs0)∈ dom(vol))
  eqeltrd((`'(Re ∘(c0 × { c1 }))" hs0), dom(vol), (`'(c0 × {(Re ` c1)})" hs0), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  imaeq1d(`'(Re ∘(c0 × { c1 })), hs0, `'(c0 × {(Re ` c1)}), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))

  ref()
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cre)
  fconstmpt(hs1, c0, (Re ` c1))
  sylan2(c0 ∈ dom(vol), c1 ∈ ℂ, (`'(c0 × {(Re ` c1)})" hs0)∈ dom(vol), (Re ` c1)∈ ℝ)
  recl(c1)

  imaeq1d(`'(Im ∘(c0 × { c1 })), hs0, `'(c0 × {(Im ` c1)}), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  cnveqd((Im ∘(c0 × { c1 })), (c0 × {(Im ` c1)}), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))

  fmptco(hs1, hs0, cim, (c0 × { c1 }), c0, (Im ` c1), c1, cc, (Im ` hs0), (c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))

thm mbfid(class c0) {

  imai(hs0)
  syl2anr(c0 ∈ dom(vol), hs0 ∈ ran((,)), (hs0 ⋂ c0)∈ dom(vol), hs0 ∈ dom(vol), c0 ∈ dom(vol))
  sylbi(hs0 ∈ ran((,)), hs0 ∈ dom(vol), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ*, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ*, hs0 =(hs1[(,)]hs2))))
  mp2b((hs0 ∈ ran((,))↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ*, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ*, hs0 =(hs1[(,)]hs2)))), ((,):(ℝ* × ℝ*)→ P(ℝ)), (,)[Fn](ℝ* × ℝ*))
  ioof()
  ffn(cioo, (ℝ* × ℝ*), P(ℝ))

  rexlimivv(hs1, hs2, cxr, cxr, hs0 =(hs1[(,)]hs2), hs0 ∈ dom(vol))

  sylancr(c0 ∈ dom(vol), ((= |` c0): c0 → ℝ), ((= |` c0): c0 → c0), c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ax-mp(((= |` c0): c0 → c0), ((= |` c0): c0 ↔ c0))

thm mbfmptcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c1, cc, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cc), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cc))
  syl(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cc), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf))
  mbff(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  feq2d(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cc, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  dmmptg(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

thm mbfmptcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c1, cc, w0)
  mpbid(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1): c0 → ℂ), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1): dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))→ ℂ))
  syl(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1): dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))→ ℂ), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn)
  mbff((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  feq2d((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), cc, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))= c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c1 ∈ c2)
  dmmptg(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: mbfdm2
blocks.content: The domain of a measurable function is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mbfdm2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, cdm(cvol), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  dmmptg(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  syl(w0, wcel(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf))
  mbfdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
}

thm mbfdm2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(vol))

  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, dom(vol), dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w0)

}

blocks.name: ismbfcn2
blocks.content: A complex function is measurable iff the real and imaginary components of the function are measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismbfcn2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cmbf))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cmbf)), wa(wcel(ccom(cre, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmbf)))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wa(wcel(ccom(cre, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmbf))), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cc))
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, cc, w0)
  ismbfcn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0)
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(ccom(cre, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmbf), wcel(ccom(cim, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cmbf))
  eleq1d(ccom(cre, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmbf, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), w0)
  cofmpt(s0, cre, c0, c1, cc, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, wf(cre, cc, cr))
  ref()
  eleq1d(ccom(cim, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cmbf, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), w0)

  diff.cre.s(s0)
  diff.cim.s(s0)

  ⊢ (w0 →((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn ↔((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1))∈ MblFn ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1))∈ MblFn)))

blocks.name: ismbf2d
blocks.content: Deduction to prove measurability of a real function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismbf2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cv(s0), cioo, cpnf)), cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cmnf, cioo, cv(s0))), cdm(cvol)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  ismbfd(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  sylan2b(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(cv(s0), cioo, cpnf)), cdm(cvol)), w3o(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cv(s0), cpnf), wceq(cv(s0), cmnf)))

  incom(cima(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cv(hs0)), cima(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cv(hs0)))

blocks.name: mbfeqa
blocks.content: If two functions are equal almost everywhere, then one is measurable iff the other is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mbfeqa(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmbf)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c3), nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4d(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmbf), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cmbf)), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2)), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)), cmbf)))
  anbi12d(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2)), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)), cmbf))
  mbfeqalem2(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1), cfv(cre, c2), c3, w0)
  fveq2d(cre, c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))))
  recld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  mbfeqalem2(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1), cfv(cim, c2), c3, w0)
  fveq2d(cim, c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))))
  imcld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  imcld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  ismbfcn2(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  ismbfcn2(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mbfeqa(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn ↔(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ MblFn))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(vol* ` c3)= 0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 \ c3))→ c1 = c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4d(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ MblFn, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1))∈ MblFn ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1))∈ MblFn), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c2))∈ MblFn ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c2))∈ MblFn))
  anbi12d(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1))∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1))∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c2))∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c2))∈ MblFn)
  mbfeqalem2(s0, c0, (Re ` c1), (Re ` c2), c3, w0)
  fveq2d(cre, c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 \ c3)))
  recld(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  recld(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  mbfeqalem2(s0, c0, (Im ` c1), (Im ` c2), c3, w0)
  fveq2d(cim, c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 \ c3)))
  imcld(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  imcld(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  ismbfcn2(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  ismbfcn2(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: mbfres
blocks.content: The restriction of a measurable function is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)

blocks.content: Measurability of a piecewise function: if ` F ` is measurable on subsets ` B ` and ` C ` of its domain, and these pieces make up all of ` A ` , then ` F ` is measurable on the whole domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)

thm mbfres2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf))

  syl6eq(ccnv(c0), cun(ccnv(cres(c0, c2)), ccnv(cres(c0, c3))), ccnv(cun(cres(c0, c2), cres(c0, c3))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cioo))))
  cnveqd(c0, cun(cres(c0, c2), cres(c0, c3)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cioo))))

thm mbfres2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℝ))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 |` c2)∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 |` c3)∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ⋃ c3)= c1)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈ MblFn, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((,)),(`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(vol)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ran((,)), w0, (`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(vol))
  eqeltrd((`' c0 " hs0), dom(vol), ((`'(c0 |` c2)" hs0)⋃(`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran((,))))
  syl6eq((`' c0 " hs0), ((`'(c0 |` c2)" hs0)⋃(`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)), ((`'(c0 |` c2)⋃ `'(c0 |` c3))" hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran((,))))
  imaeq1d(`' c0, hs0, (`'(c0 |` c2)⋃ `'(c0 |` c3)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran((,))))
  syl6eq(`' c0, (`'(c0 |` c2)⋃ `'(c0 |` c3)), `'((c0 |` c2)⋃(c0 |` c3)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran((,))))
  cnveqd(c0, ((c0 |` c2)⋃(c0 |` c3)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran((,))))
  syl6eq(c0, ((c0 |` c2)⋃(c0 |` c3)), (c0 |`(c2 ⋃ c3)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran((,))))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ran((,)), c0 =(c0 |`(c2 ⋃ c3)))
  eqtr2d(c0, (c0 |`(c2 ⋃ c3)), (c0 |` c1), w0)
  reseq2d(c0, (c2 ⋃ c3), c1, w0)
  3syl(w0, (c0 |` c1)= c0, (c0 : c1 → ℝ), c0[Fn]c1)
  ffn(c0, c1, cr)
  fnresdm(c0, c1)
  resundi(c0, c2, c3)
  cnvun((c0 |` c2), (c0 |` c3))
  imaundir(`'(c0 |` c2), `'(c0 |` c3), hs0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ran((,))), ((`'(c0 |` c2)" hs0)⋃(`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0))∈ dom(vol), (`'(c0 |` c2)" hs0)∈ dom(vol), (`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)∈ dom(vol))
  r19.21bi(hs0, ran((,)), w0, (`'(c0 |` c2)" hs0)∈ dom(vol))
  mpbid(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((,)),(`'(c0 |` c2)" hs0)∈ dom(vol)), (c0 |` c2)∈ MblFn)
  syl(w0, ((c0 |` c2)∈ MblFn ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((,)),(`'(c0 |` c2)" hs0)∈ dom(vol))), ((c0 |` c2): c2 → ℝ))
  fssresd(c0, c2, cr, c1, w0)
  syl5sseq(c2, c1, (c2 ⋃ c3), w0)
  ssun1(c2, c3)
  ismbf(hs0, (c0 |` c2), c2)
  r19.21bi(hs0, ran((,)), w0, (`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)∈ dom(vol))
  mpbid(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((,)),(`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)∈ dom(vol)), (c0 |` c3)∈ MblFn)
  syl(w0, ((c0 |` c3)∈ MblFn ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((,)),(`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0)∈ dom(vol))), ((c0 |` c3): c3 → ℝ))
  fssresd(c0, c3, cr, c1, w0)
  syl5sseq(c3, c1, (c2 ⋃ c3), w0)
  ssun2(c3, c2)
  ismbf(hs0, (c0 |` c3), c3)
  unmbl((`'(c0 |` c2)" hs0), (`'(c0 |` c3)" hs0))
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ MblFn ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran((,)),(`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(vol))), (c0 : c1 → ℝ))
  ismbf(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

blocks.name: mbfss
blocks.content: Change the domain of a measurability predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)

thm mbfss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c2))), wceq(c1, nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cmbf))

thm mbfss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(vol))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 \ c2))→ c1 = 0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1))∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1))∈ MblFn)
  mbfres2((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1)), c0, c2, (c0 \ c2), w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c0, (Re ` c1), cr, w0)
  recld(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  eqeltrd(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1))|` c2), cmbf, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(Re ` c1)), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c0, (Re ` c1), c2, w0)
  simpld(w0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(Re ` c1))∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(Im ` c1))∈ MblFn)
  eqeltrd(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1))|`(c0 \ c2)), cmbf, (s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)↦ 0), w0)
  syl5eq(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1))|`(c0 \ c2)), (s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)↦ 0), (s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)↦(Re ` c1)), w0)
  ax-mp(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1))|`(c0 \ c2))=(s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)↦(Re ` c1)), (c0 \ c2)⊆ c0)
  resmpt(s0, (c0 \ c2), c0, (Re ` c1))
  mpteq2dva(s0, (c0 \ c2), (Re ` c1), nat0, w0)
  syl6eq((Re ` c1), nat0, (Re ` 0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)))
  fveq2d(cre, c1, nat0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)))
  re0()
  mbfres2((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1)), c0, c2, (c0 \ c2), w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c0, (Im ` c1), cr, w0)
  imcld(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  eqeltrd(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1))|` c2), cmbf, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(Im ` c1)), w0)
  resmptd(s0, c0, (Im ` c1), c2, w0)
  simprd(w0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(Im ` c1))∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(Re ` c1))∈ MblFn)
  mpbid(w0, ((s0 ∈ c2 ↦(Re ` c1))∈ MblFn ∧(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(Im ` c1))∈ MblFn), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn)
  ismbfcn2(s0, c2, c1, w0)
  eqeltrd(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1))|`(c0 \ c2)), cmbf, (s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)↦ 0), w0)
  syl5eq(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1))|`(c0 \ c2)), (s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)↦ 0), (s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)↦(Im ` c1)), w0)
  ax-mp(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1))|`(c0 \ c2))=(s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)↦(Im ` c1)), (c0 \ c2)⊆ c0)
  difss(c0, c2)
  resmpt(s0, (c0 \ c2), c0, (Im ` c1))
  mpteq2dva(s0, (c0 \ c2), (Im ` c1), nat0, w0)
  syl6eq((Im ` c1), nat0, (Im ` 0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)))
  fveq2d(cim, c1, nat0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)))
  im0()
  syl5eqelr((s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)↦ 0), cmbf, ((c0 \ c2)× { 0 }), w0)
  fconstmpt(s0, (c0 \ c2), nat0)
  sylancl(w0, ((c0 \ c2)× { 0 })∈ MblFn, (c0 \ c2)∈ dom(vol), 0 ∈ ℂ)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 \ c2)∈ dom(vol), c0 ∈ dom(vol), c2 ∈ dom(vol))
  mbfdm2(s0, c2, c1, c3, w0)
  difmbl(c0, c2)
  mbfconst((c0 \ c2), nat0)
  ismbfcn2(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℂ, (s0 ∈ c2 ∨ s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)))
  biimpar(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (s0 ∈ c2 ∨ s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)))
  syl5bbr(w0, (s0 ∈ c2 ∨ s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)), s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈(c2 ⋃(c0 \ c2)))
  elun(s0, c2, (c0 \ c2))
  eleq2d(s0, (c2 ⋃(c0 \ c2)), c0, w0)
  syl5eq((c2 ⋃(c0 \ c2)), c0, (c2 ⋃ c0), w0)
  undif2(c2, c0)
  sylib(w0, (c2 ⋃ c0)= c0, c2 ⊆ c0)
  ssequn1(c2, c0)
  jaodan(w0, s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈(c0 \ c2), c1 ∈ ℂ)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c2, c1, c3, w0)
  syl6eqel(c1, cc, nat0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 \ c2)))
  0cn()
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c0 → ℂ))
} = {
  eqeltrd(((c0 × { c1 })[oF(×)]c2), cmbf, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[×](c2 ` hs0))), w0)

  mpbir2and(w0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[×](c2 ` hs0)))∈ MblFn, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re `(c1[×](c2 ` hs0))))∈ MblFn, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im `(c1[×](c2 ` hs0))))∈ MblFn)
  eqeltrd((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re `(c1[×](c2 ` hs0)))), cmbf, ((c0 × { c1 })[oF(×)](hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re `(c2 ` hs0)))), w0)

blocks.name: mbfmax
blocks.content: The maximum of two functions is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:

thm mbfneg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), cmbf))

} = {

  eqeltrrd(c0, universe, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)

  dmexd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf, w0)
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cneg(nat1), cr))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cxp(c0, csn(cneg(nat1))), cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1))))
  fconstmpt(s0, c0, cneg(nat1))

  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c1), cneg(c1), w0)

blocks.name: mbfposb
blocks.content: A function is measurable iff its positive and negative parts are measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: mbfimaopn
blocks.content: The preimage of any open set (in the complex topology) under a measurable function is measurable. (See also ~ cncombf , which explains why ` A e. dom vol ` is too weak a condition for this theorem.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mbfimaopn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cdm(cvol)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
} = {
  mbfimaopnlem(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, cmpo(hs2, hs3, cr, cr, co(cv(hs2), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs3)))), cima(cioo, cxp(cq, cq)), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cima(cioo, cxp(cq, cq)), cima(cioo, cxp(cq, cq)), cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  cbvmpt2v(hs2, hs3, hs0, hs1, cr, cr, co(cv(hs2), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs3))), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs3))))
  oveq1(cv(hs2), cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs3)))
  oveq2d(cv(hs0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs3)), co(ci, cmul, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs3), cv(hs1), ci, cmul)
  eqid(cima(cioo, cxp(cq, cq)))
  eqid(crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cima(cioo, cxp(cq, cq)), cima(cioo, cxp(cq, cq)), cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpo(hs2, hs3, cr, cr, co(cv(hs2), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs3)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(cioo, cxp(cq, cq)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)

  diff.hs2.s(hs3)

  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(co(cv(hs2), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(hs3))))

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ MblFn ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(`' c0 " c1)∈ dom(vol))
  ⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
} = {
  mbfimaopnlem(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, (hs2 ∈ ℝ, hs3 ∈ ℝ ↦(hs2[+](i[×]hs3))), ((,)"(ℚ × ℚ)), ran((hs0 ∈((,)"(ℚ × ℚ)), hs1 ∈((,)"(ℚ × ℚ))↦(hs0 × hs1))))
  cbvmpt2v(hs2, hs3, hs0, hs1, cr, cr, (hs2[+](i[×]hs3)), (hs0[+](i[×]hs1)), (hs0[+](i[×]hs3)))
  oveq1(hs2, hs0, caddc, (i[×]hs3))
  oveq2d(hs0, caddc, (i[×]hs3), (i[×]hs1), hs3 = hs1)
  oveq2(hs3, hs1, ci, cmul)
  eqid(((,)"(ℚ × ℚ)))
  eqid(ran((hs0 ∈((,)"(ℚ × ℚ)), hs1 ∈((,)"(ℚ × ℚ))↦(hs0 × hs1))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((hs2 ∈ ℝ, hs3 ∈ ℝ ↦(hs2[+](i[×]hs3))))
  diff.hs0.c(((,)"(ℚ × ℚ)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((hs2 ∈ ℝ, hs3 ∈ ℝ ↦(hs2[+](i[×]hs3))))
  diff.hs1.c(((,)"(ℚ × ℚ)))
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)

  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)

}

blocks.name: mbfimaopn2
blocks.content: The preimage of any set open in the subspace topology of the range of the function is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)

  rexlimdva(hs0, c5, (c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(c0 : c1 → c2)∧ c2 ⊆ ℂ), c3 =(hs0 ⋂ c2), (`' c0 " c3)∈ dom(vol))

  3ad2antl1(c0 ∈ MblFn, (c0 : c1 → c2), c2 ⊆ ℂ, hs0 ∈ c5, (`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(vol))

  simpl2(c0 ∈ MblFn, (c0 : c1 → c2), c2 ⊆ ℂ, hs0 ∈ c5)

  fimacnv(c0, c1, c2)

blocks.name: cncombf
blocks.content: The composition of a continuous function with a measurable function is measurable. (More generally, ` G ` can be a Borel-measurable function, but notably the condition that ` G ` be only measurable is too weak, the usual counterexample taking ` G ` to be the Cantor function and ` F ` the indicator function of the ` G ` -image of a nonmeasurable set, which is a subset of the Cantor set and hence null and measurable.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)

thm mbfmulc2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ c3)

  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)

} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[×]c2))∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re `(c1[×]c2)))∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im `(c1[×]c2)))∈ MblFn)

  ovexd(-u((Im ` c1)), cmul, (Im ` c2), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  offval2(s0, (c0 × {(Re ` c1)}), cmul, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c2)), c0, (Re ` c1), (Re ` c2), dom(vol), cr, cr, w0)
  offval2(s0, (c0 × { -u((Im ` c1))}), cmul, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c2)), c0, -u((Im ` c1)), (Im ` c2), dom(vol), cr, cr, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, -u((Im ` c1))∈ ℝ)
  a1i(w0, (c0 × { -u((Im ` c1))})=(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u((Im ` c1))))

  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, (((Re ` c1)[×](Re ` c2))[+](-u((Im ` c1))[×](Im ` c2))), (Re `(c1[×]c2)), w0)
  3eqtr4d((((Re ` c1)[×](Re ` c2))[+](-u((Im ` c1))[×](Im ` c2))), (Re `(c1[×]c2)), (((Re ` c1)[×](Re ` c2))[+]-u(((Im ` c1)[×](Im ` c2)))), (((Re ` c1)[×](Re ` c2))[-]((Im ` c1)[×](Im ` c2))), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  negsubd(((Re ` c1)[×](Re ` c2)), ((Im ` c1)[×](Im ` c2)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  mulcld((Re ` c1), (Re ` c2), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  recnd((Re ` c1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  mulcld((Im ` c1), (Im ` c2), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))

  mulneg1d((Im ` c1), (Im ` c2), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  recnd((Im ` c1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  remuld(c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  mbfadd(((c0 × {(Re ` c1)})[oF(×)](s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c2))), ((c0 × { -u((Im ` c1))})[oF(×)](s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c2))), w0)
  mbfmulc2re(c0, (Re ` c1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c2)), w0)

  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (Im ` c1)∈ ℝ)

blocks.name: mbfsup
blocks.content: The supremum of a sequence of measurable, real-valued functions is measurable. Note that in this and related theorems, ` B ( n , x ) ` is a function of both ` n ` and ` x ` , since it is an ` n ` -indexed sequence of functions on ` x ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: mbfinf
blocks.content: The infimum of a sequence of measurable, real-valued functions is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.) (Revised by AV, 13-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: mbflimsup
blocks.content: The limit supremum of a sequence of measurable real-valued functions is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.) (Revised by AV, 12-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: mbflimlem
blocks.content: The pointwise limit of a sequence of measurable real-valued functions is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.)

thm mbflimlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(c4, cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(clsp, cmpt(s1, c2, c4))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, cfv(clsp, cmpt(s1, c2, c4)), c1, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(clsp, cmpt(s1, c2, c4)), c1), wbr(cmpt(s1, c2, c4), cli, cfv(clsp, cmpt(s1, c2, c4))), wbr(cmpt(s1, c2, c4), cli, c1))
  climuni(cmpt(s1, c2, c4), cfv(clsp, cmpt(s1, c2, c4)), c1)
  mbflimsup(s0, s1, hs3, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(clsp, cmpt(s1, c2, c4))), c2, c3, c0, c4, cmpt(hs3, cr, csup(cin(cima(cmpt(s1, c2, c4), co(cv(hs3), cico, cpnf)), cxr), cxr, clt)), w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(clsp, cmpt(s1, c2, c4))))

  climrecl(hs2, cfv(clsp, cmpt(s1, c2, c4)), c2, c3, cmpt(s1, c2, c4), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  caurcvg(hs0, hs2, hs1, cmpt(s1, c2, c4), c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

thm mbflimlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)[~~>]c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)→(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c4)∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c2 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))→ c4 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), cmbf, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(limsup `(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, (limsup `(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)), c1, w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (limsup `(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))= c1, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)[~~>](limsup `(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)), (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)[~~>]c1)
  climuni((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), (limsup `(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)), c1)
  mbflimsup(s0, s1, hs3, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(limsup `(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))), c2, c3, c0, c4, (hs3 ∈ ℝ ↦ sup((((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)"(hs3[[,)]+∞))⋂ ℝ*), ℝ*, <)), w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(limsup `(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))))
  eqid((hs3 ∈ ℝ ↦ sup((((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)"(hs3[[,)]+∞))⋂ ℝ*), ℝ*, <)))
  climrecl(hs2, (limsup `(s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)), c2, c3, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  caurcvg(hs0, hs2, hs1, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), c2, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs2 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),(abs `(((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)` hs1)[-]((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)` hs2)))[<]hs0))), c3 ∈ ℤ, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)∈ dom(~~>))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ ℤ)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)∈ dom(~~>), (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)[~~>]c1)
  releldmi((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), cli, c1)
  climrel()
  climcau(hs0, hs2, hs1, c3, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), c2)
  ffvelrnda(hs2, c2, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), cr, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  fmpttd(s1, c2, c4, cr, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  anass1rs(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

  diff.hs3.s(s0)

blocks.name: isi1f
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is a simple function". A simple function is a finite nonnegative linear combination of indicator functions for finitely measurable sets. We use the idiom ` F e. dom S.1 ` to represent this concept because ` S.1 ` is the first preparation function for our final definition ` S. ` (see ~ df-itg ); unlike that operator, which can integrate any function, this operator can only integrate simple functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)

  fveq2d(cvol, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cdif(cr, csn(nat0))), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(cr, csn(nat0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq1d(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cdif(cr, csn(nat0)), ccnv(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

blocks.name: i1f0rn

  syl5eq(cima(ccnv(c0), crn(c0)), cr, cdm(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wn(wcel(nat0, crn(c0)))))
  cnvimarndm(c0)

  ⊢ ((c0 : ℝ → { 0, 1 })∧(c1 ∈ dom(vol)→(`' c0 " { 1 })= c1))

} = {

  rgenw(s0, cr, if(s0 ∈ c1, 1, 0)∈ { 0, 1 })

  fmptd(s0, c0, cr, { 0, 1 }, if(s0 ∈ c1, 1, 0), c1 ∈ dom(vol))
  a1i((c1 ∈ dom(vol)∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), if(s0 ∈ c1, 1, 0)∈ { 0, 1 })
  ifcli(nat1, nat0, { 0, 1 }, s0 ∈ c1)
  prid2(nat1, nat0)
  prid1(nat0, nat1)
  ffn(c0, cr, { 0, 1 })

  necon3bbid(nat0, nat1, ¬ hs0 ∈ c1, if(hs0 ∈ c1, 1, 0)= 1)
  eqeq1d(if(hs0 ∈ c1, 1, 0), nat1, nat0, ¬ hs0 ∈ c1)

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧(vol ` c0)∈ ℝ)→ c1 ∈ dom(S.1))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c0, 1, 0))

} = {

  a1i((c0 ∈ dom(vol)∧(vol ` c0)∈ ℝ), (c1 : ℝ → ℝ))

  0re()

blocks.name: itg1addlem1
blocks.content: Decompose a preimage, which is always a disjoint union. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)

thm itg1addlem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvol, ciun(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, cfv(cvol, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cfv(cvol, c1), cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cvol, ciun(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, cfv(cvol, c1))), wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wcel(cfv(cvol, c1), cr))), wdisj(s0, c0, c1))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wa(wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wcel(cfv(cvol, c1), cr)))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)), wcel(cfv(cvol, c1), cr))
  syl(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(hs0, c1, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))
  ralrimivva(s0, hs0, c0, c1, w0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))
  simprd(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), csn(cv(s0)))))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), csn(cv(s0))), c1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  adantrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(c1, cima(ccnv(c2), csn(cv(s0)))))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c2), csn(cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), wfn(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wfn(c2, c3))
  ffnd(c2, c3, c4, w0)
  fniniseg(c2, c3, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  invdisj(s0, hs0, c0, c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))
  volfiniun(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm itg1addlem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(vol ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))= sum(s0 ∈ c0,(vol ` c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c3 → c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ⊆(`' c2 " { s0 }))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ dom(vol))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(vol ` c1)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl3anc(w0, (vol ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))= sum(s0 ∈ c0,(vol ` c1)), c0 ∈ Fin, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ dom(vol)∧(vol ` c1)∈ ℝ)), ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, (c1 ∈ dom(vol)∧(vol ` c1)∈ ℝ))
  jca((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ dom(vol), (vol ` c1)∈ ℝ)
  syl(w0, ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(c2 ` hs0)= s0)))
  ralrimivva(s0, hs0, c0, c1, w0, (c2 ` hs0)= s0)
  simprd((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)), (c2 ` hs0)= s0, hs0 ∈ c3)
  mpbid((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)), (hs0 ∈ c3 ∧(c2 ` hs0)= s0), hs0 ∈(`' c2 " { s0 }))
  sseldd(hs0, (`' c2 " { s0 }), c1, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  adantrr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, c1 ⊆(`' c2 " { s0 }))
  simprr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  syl((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)), (hs0 ∈(`' c2 " { s0 })↔(hs0 ∈ c3 ∧(c2 ` hs0)= s0)), c2[Fn]c3)
  adantr(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1), c2[Fn]c3)
  ffnd(c2, c3, c4, w0)
  fniniseg(c2, c3, hs0, s0)
  invdisj(s0, hs0, c0, c1, (c2 ` hs0))
  volfiniun(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.content: The sum of two simple functions is a simple function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: itg1addlem2

Since it is infinite only when both ` i ` and ` j ` are zero, we arbitrarily define it to be zero there to simplify the sums that are manipulated in ~ itg1addlem4 and ~ itg1addlem5 . blocks.name: itg1add
blocks.content: The integral of a sum of simple functions is the sum of the integrals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg1add(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(citg1, co(c0, cof(caddc), c1)), co(cfv(citg1, c0), caddc, cfv(citg1, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)))
} = {
  itg1addlem5(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cr, cr, cif(nat0, cfv(cvol, cin(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0))), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs1))))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wceq(cv(hs1), nat0)))), cres(caddc, cxp(crn(c0), crn(c1))), w0)
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cr, cr, cif(nat0, cfv(cvol, cin(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0))), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs1))))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wceq(cv(hs1), nat0)))))
  eqid(cres(caddc, cxp(crn(c0), crn(c1))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ dom(S.1))
} = {

  eqid((hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ ↦ if((hs0 = 0 ∧ hs1 = 0), 0,(vol `((`' c0 " { hs0 })⋂(`' c1 " { hs1 }))))))
  eqid((+ |`(ran(c0)× ran(c1))))

  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

}

blocks.name: i1fres
blocks.content: The "restriction" of a simple function to a measurable subset is simple. (It's not actually a restriction because it is zero instead of undefined outside ` A ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  nfif(s0, cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(hs0)), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(hs0))))
  nfbr(s0, nat0, cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(hs0)))
  nfcv(s0, cle)

  breq2d(nat0, cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))

  ifbieq1d(cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(s0)), nat0, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(s0))), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(s0)), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(s0)), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(c0, cr))

  i1ff(cmpt(s0, cr, c0))
  fvmpt2(s0, cr, c0, cr, cmpt(s0, cr, c0))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cr, c0))
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs0, cr, cif(cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(hs0)), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(hs0))))), cdm(citg1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cdm(citg1)))
  i1fpos(hs0, cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cmpt(hs0, cr, cif(cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(hs0)), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cv(hs0))))))

blocks.name: i1fsub
blocks.content: The difference of two simple functions is a simple function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm i1fsub(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1))), wcel(co(c0, cof(cmin), c1), cdm(citg1)))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(c0, cof(cmin), c1), cdm(citg1), co(c0, cof(caddc), co(cxp(cr, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1))))
  mp3an3an(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)), wceq(co(c0, cof(caddc), co(cxp(cr, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1)), co(c0, cof(cmin), c1)), wcel(cr, universe), wf(c0, cr, cc), wf(c1, cr, cc))
  reex()
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wf(c0, cr, cc), wf(c0, cr, cr), wss(cr, cc))
  i1ff(c0)
  fss(c0, cr, cr, cc)
  sylancl(wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)), wf(c1, cr, cc), wf(c1, cr, cr), wss(cr, cc))
  i1ff(c1)
  ax-resscn()
  fss(c1, cr, cr, cc)
  ofnegsub(cr, universe, c0, c1)
  i1fadd(c0, co(cxp(cr, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)))
  i1fmulc(cneg(nat1), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cr))
  neg1rr()
}

thm i1fsub(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ c1 ∈ dom(S.1))→(c0[oF(-)]c1)∈ dom(S.1))
} = {
  eqeltrrd((c0[oF(-)]c1), dom(S.1), (c0[oF(+)]((ℝ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c1)), (c0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ c1 ∈ dom(S.1)))
  mp3an3an(c0 ∈ dom(S.1), c1 ∈ dom(S.1), (c0[oF(+)]((ℝ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c1))=(c0[oF(-)]c1), ℝ ∈ 𝕌, (c0 : ℝ → ℂ), (c1 : ℝ → ℂ))
  reex()
  sylancl(c0 ∈ dom(S.1), (c0 : ℝ → ℂ), (c0 : ℝ → ℝ), ℝ ⊆ ℂ)
  i1ff(c0)
  fss(c0, cr, cr, cc)
  sylancl(c1 ∈ dom(S.1), (c1 : ℝ → ℂ), (c1 : ℝ → ℝ), ℝ ⊆ ℂ)
  i1ff(c1)
  ax-resscn()
  fss(c1, cr, cr, cc)
  ofnegsub(cr, universe, c0, c1)
  i1fadd(c0, ((ℝ × { -u(1)})[oF(×)]c1), (c0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ c1 ∈ dom(S.1)))
  simpl(c0 ∈ dom(S.1), c1 ∈ dom(S.1))
  i1fmulc(-u(1), c1, (c0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ c1 ∈ dom(S.1)))
  simpr(c0 ∈ dom(S.1), c1 ∈ dom(S.1))
  a1i((c0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ c1 ∈ dom(S.1)), -u(1)∈ ℝ)
  neg1rr()
}

thm itg1sub(class c0, class c1) {

} = {

  simpl(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)))
  i1fmulc(cneg(nat1), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1))))
  oveq2d(cfv(citg1, c0), caddc, cfv(citg1, co(cxp(cr, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1)), cneg(cfv(citg1, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1))))
  eqtrd(cfv(citg1, co(cxp(cr, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1)), cneg(cfv(citg1, c1)), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cfv(citg1, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1))))
  itg1mulc(cneg(nat1), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1))))

  simpr(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)))
  fveq2d(citg1, co(c0, cof(caddc), co(cxp(cr, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1)), co(c0, cof(cmin), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1))))
  mp3an3an(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)), wceq(co(c0, cof(caddc), co(cxp(cr, csn(cneg(nat1))), cof(cmul), c1)), co(c0, cof(cmin), c1)), wcel(cr, universe), wf(c0, cr, cc), wf(c1, cr, cc))
  reex()
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wf(c0, cr, cc), wf(c0, cr, cr), wss(cr, cc))
  i1ff(c0)
  fss(c0, cr, cr, cc)
  sylancl(wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)), wf(c1, cr, cc), wf(c1, cr, cr), wss(cr, cc))
  i1ff(c1)
  ax-resscn()
  fss(c1, cr, cr, cc)
  ofnegsub(cr, universe, c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)), wceq(co(cfv(citg1, c0), caddc, cneg(cfv(citg1, c1))), co(cfv(citg1, c0), cmin, cfv(citg1, c1))), wcel(cfv(citg1, c0), cc), wcel(cfv(citg1, c1), cc))
  recnd(cfv(citg1, c0), wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)))
  itg1cl(c0)
  recnd(cfv(citg1, c1), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)))
  itg1cl(c1)
  negsub(cfv(citg1, c0), cfv(citg1, c1))
}

  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(crn(c0), csn(nat0)))), wceq(cfv(covol, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0)))), nat0), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0))), c1), wss(c1, cr), wceq(cfv(covol, c1), nat0))
  ssrdv(s0, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0))), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(crn(c0), csn(nat0)))))
  sylbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(crn(c0), csn(nat0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(crn(c0), csn(nat0)))), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wfn(c0, cr))

thm itg1lea(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(citg1, c0), cle, cfv(citg1, c1)))

  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wbr(cfv(citg1, c0), cle, cfv(citg1, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(citg1, c1), cmin, cfv(citg1, c0))))

  i1fsub(c1, c0)

  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2)), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  subge0d(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), cr, c1, cr, w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), cr, c0, cr, w0)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2)), wceq(cfv(co(c1, cof(cmin), c0), cv(s0)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  eldifi(cv(s0), cr, c2)
  ofval(cv(s0), cr, c1, cmin, c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr, cr, universe, universe, w0)
  ffnd(c1, cr, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c1, cr, cr), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)))
  i1ff(c1)
  ffnd(c0, cr, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c0, cr, cr), wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)))
  i1ff(c0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cr, universe))
  reex()
  inidm(cr)
  eqidd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  eqidd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(citg1, co(c1, cof(cmin), c0)), co(cfv(citg1, c1), cmin, cfv(citg1, c0))), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)))
  itg1sub(c1, c0)
  subge0d(cfv(citg1, c1), cfv(citg1, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(citg1, c1), cr), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1)))

  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cof(cmin), c0)
  diff.cof.s(s0, cmin)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
}

thm itg1lea(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(S.1 ` c0)[≤](S.1 ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(S.1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(vol* ` c2)= 0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ dom(S.1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2))→(c0 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, (S.1 ` c0)[≤](S.1 ` c1), 0[≤]((S.1 ` c1)[-](S.1 ` c0)))
  breqtrd(nat0, cle, ((S.1 ` c1)[-](S.1 ` c0)), (S.1 `(c1[oF(-)]c0)), w0)
  itg1ge0a(s0, (c1[oF(-)]c0), c2, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c1[oF(-)]c0)∈ dom(S.1), c1 ∈ dom(S.1), c0 ∈ dom(S.1))
  i1fsub(c1, c0)
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, ((c1[oF(-)]c0)` s0), ((c1 ` s0)[-](c0 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2)))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2)), 0[≤]((c1 ` s0)[-](c0 ` s0)), (c0 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s0))
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2), (0[≤]((c1 ` s0)[-](c0 ` s0))↔(c0 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s0)), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  subge0d((c1 ` s0), (c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ))
  ffvelrnda(s0, cr, c1, cr, w0)
  ffvelrnda(s0, cr, c0, cr, w0)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2), ((c1[oF(-)]c0)` s0)=((c1 ` s0)[-](c0 ` s0)), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  eldifi(s0, cr, c2)
  ofval(s0, cr, c1, cmin, c0, (c1 ` s0), (c0 ` s0), cr, cr, universe, universe, w0)
  ffnd(c1, cr, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, (c1 : ℝ → ℝ), c1 ∈ dom(S.1))
  i1ff(c1)
  ffnd(c0, cr, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 : ℝ → ℝ), c0 ∈ dom(S.1))
  i1ff(c0)
  a1i(w0, ℝ ∈ 𝕌)
  reex()
  inidm(cr)
  eqidd((c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ))
  eqidd((c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ))
  syl2anc(w0, (S.1 `(c1[oF(-)]c0))=((S.1 ` c1)[-](S.1 ` c0)), c1 ∈ dom(S.1), c0 ∈ dom(S.1))
  itg1sub(c1, c0)
  subge0d((S.1 ` c1), (S.1 ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, (S.1 ` c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ dom(S.1))
  itg1cl(c1)
  syl(w0, (S.1 ` c0)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ dom(S.1))
  itg1cl(c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, oF(-), c0)
  diff.cof.s(s0, cmin)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
}

thm mbfi1fseqlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cxp(cn, cr), co(nat0, cico, cpnf))), wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmbf)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(c0, cxp(cn, cr), co(nat0, cico, cpnf))), diffsc(s0, c0))

  ralrimivva(s0, s1, cn, cr, w0, wcel(co(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  sylanbrc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))), wcel(co(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(co(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))))
  nndivred(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))))
  syl22anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), wcel(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))), wcel(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cr), wcel(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))), cr))
  reflcl(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))
  nn0ge0d(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))), wcel(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cn0), wcel(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))))
  remulcld(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))))

  syl12anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))
  sylib(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))), wa(wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  syl2an(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))
  ffvelrn(c1, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cv(s1))
  elrege0(cfv(c1, cv(s1)))
  nn0ge0d(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))))
  nnnn0d(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))))
  mulge0(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))
  flge0nn0(co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))
  nnred(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))))
  nngt0d(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr))))
  ad2antrl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), cr), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), cn))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)), cn), wcel(nat2, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  2nn()
  nnnn0(cv(s0))
  nnexpcl(nat2, cv(s0))
  divge0(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))
  elrege0(co(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))))
  fmpt2(s0, s1, cn, cr, co(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s0))), co(nat0, cico, cpnf), c0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)

  diff.cico.s(s1)
  diff.cpnf.s(s1)

thm mbfi1fseqlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), c0, wbr(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(c0), cicc, c0))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s1, s2, cn, cr, co(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c3, cv(s2)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s1, cn, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1), wbr(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cle, cv(s1))), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(cv(s1)), cicc, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), c0, wbr(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(c0), cicc, c0)))))), wi(w0, wcel(c3, cmbf)))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), c0, wbr(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(c0), cicc, c0)))))), wi(w0, wf(c3, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), c0, wbr(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(c0), cicc, c0)))))), wceq(c2, cmpo(s1, s2, cn, cr, co(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c3, cv(s2)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), c0, wbr(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(c0), cicc, c0)))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), c0, wbr(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(c0), cicc, c0)))))), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), c0, wbr(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(c0), cicc, c0)))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), c0, wbr(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(c0), cicc, c0)))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), c0, wbr(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(c0), cicc, c0)))))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), c0, wbr(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(c0), cicc, c0)))))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cif(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), c0, wbr(co(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), co(cneg(c0), cicc, c0)))))), diffsc(s2, c3))

blocks.name: mbfi1fseqlem4
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ mbfi1fseq . This lemma is not as interesting as it is long - it is simply checking that ` G ` is in fact a sequence of simple functions, by verifying that its range is in ` ( 0 ... n 2 ^ n ) / ( 2 ^ n ) ` (which is to say, the numbers from ` 0 ` to ` n ` in increments of ` 1 / ( 2 ^ n ) ` ), and also that the preimage of each point ` k ` is measurable, because it is equal to ` ( -u n [,] n ) i^i ( ``' F " ( k [,) k + 1 / ( 2 ^ n ) ) ) ` for ` k < n ` and ` ( -u n [,] n ) i^i ( ``' F " ( k [,) +oo ) ) ` for ` k = n ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2014.)

blocks.content: Lemma for ~ mbfi1fseq . Verify that ` G ` describes an increasing sequence of positive functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: mbfi1fseqlem6
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ mbfi1fseq . Verify that ` G ` converges pointwise to ` F ` , and wrap up the existential quantifier. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mbfi1fseqlem6(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), cn, cdm(citg1)), wral(s1, cn, wa(wbr(c0p, cofr(cle), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cofr(cle), cfv(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))))), wral(s2, cr, wbr(cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), cli, cfv(c0, cv(s2)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s3, s4, cn, cr, co(cfv(cfl, co(cfv(c0, cv(s4)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s3)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cv(s3)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s3, cn, cmpt(s2, cr, cif(cif(co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s2)), cv(s3), wbr(co(cv(s3), c1, cv(s2)), cle, cv(s3))), nat0, wcel(cv(s2), co(cneg(cv(s3)), cicc, cv(s3)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)

blocks.name: mbfi1fseq
blocks.content: A characterization of measurability in terms of simple functions (this is an if and only if for nonnegative functions, although we don't prove it). Any nonnegative measurable function is the limit of an increasing sequence of nonnegative simple functions. This proof is an example of a poor de Bruijn factor - the formalized proof is much longer than an average hand proof, which usually just describes the function ` G ` and "leaves the details as an exercise to the reader". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cof.s(s1, cof(cmin))
  diff.cof.s(s1, cmin)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)

  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), cof(cof(cmin)), cv(hs2)))

blocks.pretty:
thm mbfi1flim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0,((s0 : ℕ → dom(S.1))∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>](c1 ` s1)))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c0 → ℝ))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, ∃(s0,((s0 : ℕ → dom(S.1))∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>](c1 ` s1)))), ∃(s0,((s0 : ℕ → dom(S.1))∧ ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>]((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1)))))
  mbfi1flimlem(s0, s1, s2, (hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0)), w0)
  mbfss(hs0, cr, if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0), c0, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, ℝ ∈ dom(vol))
  rembl()
  iffalsed((c1 ` hs0), nat0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℝ \ c0)), hs0 ∈ c0)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈(ℝ \ c0), ¬ hs0 ∈ c0)
  eldifn(hs0, cr, c0)
  fmpttd(hs0, cr, if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0), cr, w0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0)∈ ℝ)
  ifclda((c1 ` hs0), nat0, cr, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c0, c1, cr, w0)
  0red((w0 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c0))
  eximdv(s0, w0, ((s0 : ℕ → dom(S.1))∧ ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>]((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1))), ((s0 : ℕ → dom(S.1))∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>](c1 ` s1))))
  anim2d(w0, (s0 : ℕ → dom(S.1)), ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>]((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>](c1 ` s1)))
  sylibd(w0, ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>]((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>](c1 ` s1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>]((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1)))
  syl(w0, (∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>]((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1))→ ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>]((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1))), c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ssralv(s1, c0, cr, (s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>]((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1))
  ralbidva(s1, c0, w0, (s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>]((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1), (s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1))[~~>](c1 ` s1))
  breq2d((s2 ∈ ℕ ↦((s0 ` s2)` s1)), cli, ((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1), (c1 ` s1), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  eqtrd(((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1), (c1 ` s1), if(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1), 0), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  syl((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), ((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))` s1)= if(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1), 0), s1 ∈ ℝ)
  sselda(s1, c0, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, c0 ∈ dom(vol))
  mbfdm2(hs0, c0, if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0), universe, w0)
  syl5eqel((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0)), cmbf, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1 ` hs0)), w0)
  mpteq2ia(hs0, c0, if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0), (c1 ` hs0))
  iftrue((c1 ` hs0), nat0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eqeltrrd((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1 ` hs0)), cmbf, c1, w0)
  feqmptd(hs0, c1, c0, cr, w0)
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0)∈ 𝕌)
  ifex((c1 ` hs0), nat0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  fvex(c1, hs0)
  mblss(c0)
  fvmpt(hs0, s1, cr, (hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0)), if(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1), 0), if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))
  ifbieq1d((c1 ` hs0), nat0, (c1 ` s1), hs0 = s1, hs0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(hs0, s1, c0)
  fveq2(hs0, s1, c1)
  eqid((hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0)))
  ifex((c1 ` s1), nat0, s1 ∈ c0)
  fvex(c1, s1)
  c0ex()
  adantl(w0, s1 ∈ c0, if(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1), 0)=(c1 ` s1))
  iftrue((c1 ` s1), nat0, s1 ∈ c0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, cr, if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.cif.s(s0, (c1 ` hs0), nat0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, hs0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, hs0, cr, if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))
  diff.cif.s(s1, (c1 ` hs0), nat0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, hs0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s2, hs0, cr, if(hs0 ∈ c0,(c1 ` hs0), 0))
  diff.cr.s(s2)
  diff.cif.s(s2, (c1 ` hs0), nat0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c1, hs0)
  diff.nat0.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(if(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ` s1), 0))
}

blocks.name: mbfmullem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ mbfmul . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mbfmullem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cof(cmul), c1), cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, cn, cdm(citg1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), cli, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c4, cn, cdm(citg1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), cli, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

thm mbfmullem(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[oF(×)]c1)∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → ℝ))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c2 → ℝ))
} = {
  mp2and(w0, (c0[oF(×)]c1)∈ MblFn, ∃(hs0,((hs0 : ℕ → dom(S.1))∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦((hs0 ` hs1)` hs2))[~~>](c0 ` hs2)))), ∃(hs3,((hs3 : ℕ → dom(S.1))∧ ∀(hs2 ∈ c2,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦((hs3 ` hs1)` hs2))[~~>](c1 ` hs2)))))
  mbfi1flim(hs0, hs2, hs1, c2, c0, w0)
  mbfi1flim(hs3, hs2, hs1, c2, c1, w0)

blocks.content: The product of two measurable functions is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.)

  mpbid(w0, ((hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))↦(Re `(c1 ` hs0)))∈ MblFn ∧(hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))↦(Im `(c1 ` hs0)))∈ MblFn), (hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))↦(c1 ` hs0))∈ MblFn)
  syl5eqelr((hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))↦(c1 ` hs0)), cmbf, ((hs0 ∈ dom(c1)↦(c1 ` hs0))|`(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))), w0)
  ax-mp(((hs0 ∈ dom(c1)↦(c1 ` hs0))|`(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)))=(hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))↦(c1 ` hs0)), (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))⊆ dom(c1))
  inss2(dom(c0), dom(c1))
  resmpt(hs0, (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)), dom(c1), (c1 ` hs0))
  syl2anc(w0, ((hs0 ∈ dom(c1)↦(c1 ` hs0))|`(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)))∈ MblFn, (hs0 ∈ dom(c1)↦(c1 ` hs0))∈ MblFn, (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))∈ dom(vol))
  eqeltrrd((hs0 ∈ dom(c1)↦(c1 ` hs0)), cmbf, c1, w0)
  feqmptd(hs0, c1, dom(c1), cc, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))∈ dom(vol), dom(c0)∈ dom(vol), dom(c1)∈ dom(vol))
  syl(w0, dom(c0)∈ dom(vol), c0 ∈ MblFn)
  mbfdm(c0)
  syl(w0, dom(c1)∈ dom(vol), c1 ∈ MblFn)
  mbfdm(c1)
  inmbl(dom(c0), dom(c1))
  mbfres((hs0 ∈ dom(c1)↦(c1 ` hs0)), (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)))
  ismbfcn2(hs0, (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)), (c1 ` hs0), w0)
  fmpttd(hs0, (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)), (Im `(c0 ` hs0)), cr, w0)
  imcld((c0 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))))
  fmpttd(hs0, (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)), (Re `(c1 ` hs0)), cr, w0)
  recld((c1 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))))
  ismbfcn2(hs0, (dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)), ((c0 ` hs0)[×](c1 ` hs0)), w0)
  mulcld((c0 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1))))
  syl2an(w0, hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)), (c0 ` hs0)∈ ℂ, (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℂ), hs0 ∈ dom(c0))
  syl(w0, (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℂ), c0 ∈ MblFn)
  mbff(c0)
  elinel1(hs0, dom(c0), dom(c1))
  ffvelrn(c0, dom(c0), cc, hs0)
  syl2an(w0, hs0 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ dom(c1)), (c1 ` hs0)∈ ℂ, (c1 : dom(c1)→ ℂ), hs0 ∈ dom(c1))
  syl(w0, (c1 : dom(c1)→ ℂ), c1 ∈ MblFn)

blocks.name: itg2lcl
blocks.content: The set of lower sums is a set of extended reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2lcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(c0, cxr)
  -| wceq(c0, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wss(c0, cxr), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wss(c0, cxr), diffsc(s1, c1))
  eqsstri(c0, cxr, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))))))
  abssi(s0, cxr, wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1))))))
  rexlimiv(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), cxr))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(cv(s1), cdm(citg1)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wcel(cfv(citg1, cv(s1)), cxr))
  rexrd(cfv(citg1, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cdm(citg1)))
  itg1cl(cv(s1))
  eleq1d(cv(s0), cxr, cfv(citg1, cv(s1)), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))))
  simpr(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1))))
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cxr)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
}

thm itg2lcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ c0 ⊆ ℝ*

  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, d(s0, c1))
  a1ii(c0 ⊆ ℝ*, d(s1, c1))
  eqsstri(c0, cxr, { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ dom(S.1),(s1[oR(≤)]c1 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1)))})
  abssi(s0, cxr, ∃(s1 ∈ dom(S.1),(s1[oR(≤)]c1 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1))))
  rexlimiv(s1, dom(S.1), (s1[oR(≤)]c1 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1)), s0 ∈ ℝ*)
  syl5ibrcom(s1 ∈ dom(S.1), (s1[oR(≤)]c1 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1)), s0 ∈ ℝ*, (S.1 ` s1)∈ ℝ*)
  rexrd((S.1 ` s1), s1 ∈ dom(S.1))
  itg1cl(s1)
  eleq1d(s0, cxr, (S.1 ` s1), (s1[oR(≤)]c1 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1)))
  simpr(s1[oR(≤)]c1, s0 =(S.1 ` s1))
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, cxr)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
}

thm itg2val(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), csup(c1, cxr, clt)))
  -| wceq(c1, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  fvmptmap(hs0, c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), citg2, csup(c1, cxr, clt), csup(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))))), cxr, clt))
  supex(c1, cxr, clt)
  xrltso()
  reex()
  ovex(nat0, cicc, cpnf)
  supeq1d(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))))), cxr, clt, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cab(s0, wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))))), c1, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  abbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1))))), wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1))))))
  rexbidv(s1, cdm(citg1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c0))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), cofr(cle))
  df-itg2(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  diff.hs0.c(csup(c1, cxr, clt))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

} = {

  syl6eqr({ s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ dom(S.1),(s1[oR(≤)]hs0 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1)))}, c1, { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ dom(S.1),(s1[oR(≤)]c0 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1)))}, hs0 = c0)
  abbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, ∃(s1 ∈ dom(S.1),(s1[oR(≤)]hs0 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1))), ∃(s1 ∈ dom(S.1),(s1[oR(≤)]c0 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1))))
  rexbidv(s1, dom(S.1), hs0 = c0, (s1[oR(≤)]hs0 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1)), (s1[oR(≤)]c0 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1)))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, s1[oR(≤)]hs0, s0 =(S.1 ` s1), s1[oR(≤)]c0)
  breq2(hs0, c0, s1, oR(≤))
  df-itg2(hs0, s0, s1)

thm itg2l(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cab(s1, wrex(s0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(citg1, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0)))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  bitri(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cab(s1, wrex(s0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(citg1, cv(s0))))))))
  eleq2i(c0, c1, cab(s1, wrex(s0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(citg1, cv(s0)))))))
  elab3(s1, c0, wrex(s0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(citg1, cv(s0))))), wrex(s0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0))))))
  rexlimivw(s0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl6eqel(c0, universe, cfv(citg1, cv(s0)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0)))))
  simpr(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0))))
  fvex(citg1, cv(s0))
  rexbidv(s0, cdm(citg1), wceq(cv(s1), c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(citg1, cv(s0)))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0)))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(citg1, cv(s0))), wceq(c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0))))
  eqeq1(cv(s1), c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0)))
  diff.wrex.s(s1, s0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0)))))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, citg1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wbr(cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2), wceq(c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0))))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cv(s0), cofr(cle), c2)
