  diff.wceq.s(s1, c0, cfv(citg1, cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, citg1, cv(s0))
  diff.citg1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)

thm itg2l(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {

blocks.name: itg2lr

blocks.origin:
thm itg2lr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wbr(c0, cofr(cle), c1)), wcel(cfv(citg1, c0), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cab(s0, wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wbr(c0, cofr(cle), c1)), wcel(cfv(citg1, c0), c2), wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cfv(citg1, c0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1))))))
  mpanr2(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wbr(c0, cofr(cle), c1), wrex(s1, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cfv(citg1, c0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cfv(citg1, c0), cfv(citg1, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(citg1, c0))
  rspcev(s1, c0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(c0, cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cfv(citg1, c0), cfv(citg1, c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cfv(citg1, c0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cfv(citg1, c0), cfv(citg1, cv(s1))), wbr(c0, cofr(cle), c1), wceq(cfv(citg1, c0), cfv(citg1, c0)))

thm itg2lr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ c0[oR(≤)]c1)→(S.1 ` c0)∈ c2)
  ⊣ c2 = { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ dom(S.1),(s1[oR(≤)]c1 ∧ s0 =(S.1 ` s1)))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ c0[oR(≤)]c1), (S.1 ` c0)∈ c2, ∃(s1 ∈ dom(S.1),(s1[oR(≤)]c1 ∧(S.1 ` c0)=(S.1 ` s1))))
  mpanr2(c0 ∈ dom(S.1), c0[oR(≤)]c1, ∃(s1 ∈ dom(S.1),(s1[oR(≤)]c1 ∧(S.1 ` c0)=(S.1 ` s1))), (S.1 ` c0)=(S.1 ` c0))
  eqid((S.1 ` c0))
  rspcev(s1, c0, dom(S.1), (c0[oR(≤)]c1 ∧(S.1 ` c0)=(S.1 ` c0)), (s1[oR(≤)]c1 ∧(S.1 ` c0)=(S.1 ` s1)))
  anbi12d(s1 = c0, s1[oR(≤)]c1, (S.1 ` c0)=(S.1 ` s1), c0[oR(≤)]c1, (S.1 ` c0)=(S.1 ` c0))
  breq1(s1, c0, oR(≤), c1)
  eqeq2d((S.1 ` c0), (S.1 ` s1), (S.1 ` c0), s1 = c0)
  fveq2(s1, c0, citg1)
  itg2l(s1, s0, (S.1 ` c0), c2, c1)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, citg1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0[oR(≤)]c1, (S.1 ` c0)=(S.1 ` c0))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, oR(≤), c1)
  diff.cofr.s(s1, cle)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (S.1 ` c0), (S.1 ` c0))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, citg1, c0)
  diff.citg1.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, citg1, c0)
  diff.citg1.s(s0)

blocks.name: xrge0f

  ax-resscn()
  ofrfval(hs0, cxp(cr, csn(nat0)), cle, c0, cr, nat0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cr, cr, universe, universe, wf(c0, cr, cr))
  mp1i(wf(c0, cr, cr), wfn(cxp(cr, csn(nat0)), cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  fnconstg(nat0, cr, cr)
  ffn(c0, cr, cr)
  a1i(wf(c0, cr, cr), wcel(cr, universe))
  reex()
  inidm(cr)
  adantl(wf(c0, cr, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(cfv(cxp(cr, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0)), nat0))
  fvconst2(cv(hs0), cr, nat0)

  biantrurd(wa(wf(c0, cr, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cxr))
  rexrd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wf(c0, cr, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)))
  ffvelrn(c0, cr, cr, cv(hs0))
  elxrge0(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))
  ffnfv(hs0, c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(cr, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.w(wf(c0, cr, cr))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))

blocks.name: itg2cl

blocks.name: itg2lecl

blocks.name: itg2seq
blocks.content: Definitional property of the ` S.2 ` integral: for any function ` F ` there is a countable sequence ` g ` of simple functions less than ` F ` whose integrals converge to the integral of ` F ` . (This theorem is for the most part unnecessary in lieu of ~ itg2i1fseq , but unlike that theorem this one doesn't require ` F ` to be measurable.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  diff.hs3.c(cfv(citg2, c0))
}

thm itg2uba(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(S.1 ` c0)[≤](S.2 ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : ℝ →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(S.1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(vol* ` c2)= 0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2))→(c0 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  xrletrd((S.1 ` c0), (S.2 ` c1), (S.1 `(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))), w0)
  rexrd((S.1 ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, (S.1 ` c0)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ dom(S.1))
  itg1cl(c0)
  rexrd((S.1 `(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))), w0)
  syl(w0, (S.1 `(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))))∈ ℝ, (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))∈ dom(S.1))
  itg1cl((s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))))
  syl(w0, (S.2 ` c1)∈ ℝ*, (c1 : ℝ →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  itg2cl(c1)
  itg1lea(hs0, c0, (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))), c2, w0)
  breqtrrd((c0 ` hs0), cle, ((s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))` hs0), (c0 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℝ \ c2)))
  leidd((c0 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℝ \ c2)))
  syl2an(w0, hs0 ∈(ℝ \ c2), (c0 ` hs0)∈ ℝ, (c0 : ℝ → ℝ), hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  syl(w0, (c0 : ℝ → ℝ), c0 ∈ dom(S.1))
  i1ff(c0)
  eldifi(hs0, cr, c2)
  ffvelrn(c0, cr, cr, hs0)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈(ℝ \ c2), ((s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))` hs0)=(c0 ` hs0))
  sylbi(hs0 ∈(ℝ \ c2), ((s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))` hs0)=(c0 ` hs0), (hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2))
  eldif(hs0, cr, c2)
  sylan9eq(((s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))` hs0), (c0 ` hs0), if(hs0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` hs0)), hs0 ∈ ℝ, ¬ hs0 ∈ c2)
  fvmpt(s0, hs0, cr, (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))), if(hs0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` hs0)), if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))
  ifbieq2d(nat0, (c0 ` s0), (c0 ` hs0), s0 = hs0, s0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c2)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c2)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))))
  ifex(nat0, (c0 ` hs0), hs0 ∈ c2)
  fvex(c0, hs0)
  iffalse(nat0, (c0 ` hs0), hs0 ∈ c2)
  syl3anc(w0, (S.1 `(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))))[≤](S.2 ` c1), (c1 : ℝ →(0[[,]]+∞)), (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))∈ dom(S.1), (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))[oR(≤)]c1)
  syl2anc(w0, (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))∈ dom(S.1), c0 ∈ dom(S.1), (ℝ \ c2)∈ dom(vol))
  syl(w0, (ℝ \ c2)∈ dom(vol), c2 ∈ dom(vol))
  syl2anc(w0, c2 ∈ dom(vol), c2 ⊆ ℝ, (vol* ` c2)= 0)
  nulmbl(c2)
  cmmbl(c2)
  i1fres(s0, c0, (ℝ \ c2), (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))))
  mpteq2ia(s0, cr, if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)), if(s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2),(c0 ` s0), 0))
  syl5eqr(if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)), if(s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2),(c0 ` s0), 0), if(¬ s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0), 0), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  ifnot((c0 ` s0), nat0, s0 ∈ c2)
  ifbid((c0 ` s0), nat0, s0 ∈ ℝ, ¬ s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2))
  baibr(s0 ∈ ℝ, ¬ s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2))
  mpbird(w0, (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)))[oR(≤)]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ, if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))[≤](c1 ` s0)))
  ralrimiva(s0, cr, w0, if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))[≤](c1 ` s0))
  pm2.61dan((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))[≤](c1 ` s0), s0 ∈ c2)
  eqbrtrd(if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)), cle, (c1 ` s0), nat0, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  adantl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), s0 ∈ c2, if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))= 0)
  iftrue(nat0, (c0 ` s0), s0 ∈ c2)
  adantr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), s0 ∈ c2, 0[≤](c1 ` s0))
  simprd((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), 0[≤](c1 ` s0), (c1 ` s0)∈ ℝ*)
  sylib((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), ((c1 ` s0)∈ ℝ* ∧ 0[≤](c1 ` s0)), (c1 ` s0)∈(0[[,]]+∞))
  ffvelrnda(s0, cr, c1, (0[[,]]+∞), w0)
  elxrge0((c1 ` s0))
  eqbrtrd(if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)), cle, (c1 ` s0), (c0 ` s0), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)∧ ¬ s0 ∈ c2))
  adantl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), ¬ s0 ∈ c2, if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))=(c0 ` s0))
  iffalse(nat0, (c0 ` s0), s0 ∈ c2)
  anassrs(w0, s0 ∈ ℝ, ¬ s0 ∈ c2, (c0 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s0))
  sylan2br(w0, (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ ¬ s0 ∈ c2), (c0 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s0), s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2))
  eldif(s0, cr, c2)
  ofrfval2(s0, (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))), cle, c1, cr, if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0)), (c1 ` s0), universe, universe, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, ℝ ∈ 𝕌)
  reex()
  a1i((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))∈ 𝕌)
  ifex(nat0, (c0 ` s0), s0 ∈ c2)
  c0ex()
  fvex(c0, s0)
  fvexd(c1, s0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ))
  eqidd((s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))), w0)
  feqmptd(s0, c1, cr, (0[[,]]+∞), w0)
  itg2ub(c1, (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c2, 0,(c0 ` s0))))

blocks.name: itg2lea
blocks.content: Approximate version of ~ itg2le . If ` F <_ G ` for almost all ` x ` , then ` S.2 F <_ S.2 G ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2lea(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(citg2, c0), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c2), nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(cfv(citg2, c0), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)), wral(hs0, cdm(citg1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0), wbr(cfv(citg1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cdm(citg1), w0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0), wbr(cfv(citg1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(citg2, c1))))
  expr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0), wbr(cfv(citg1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)))
  itg2uba(s0, cv(hs0), c1, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0))))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0))

thm itg2lea(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(S.2 ` c0)[≤](S.2 ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : ℝ →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : ℝ →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(vol* ` c2)= 0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2))→(c0 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, (S.2 ` c0)[≤](S.2 ` c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1),(hs0[oR(≤)]c0 →(S.1 ` hs0)[≤](S.2 ` c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, dom(S.1), w0, (hs0[oR(≤)]c0 →(S.1 ` hs0)[≤](S.2 ` c1)))
  expr(w0, hs0 ∈ dom(S.1), hs0[oR(≤)]c0, (S.1 ` hs0)[≤](S.2 ` c1))
  itg2uba(s0, hs0, c1, c2, (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0)))
  simprl(w0, hs0 ∈ dom(S.1), hs0[oR(≤)]c0)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0), c2 ⊆ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0), (vol* ` c2)= 0)
  xrletrd((hs0 ` s0), (c1 ` s0), (c0 ` s0), ((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0))∧ s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2)))
  rexrd((hs0 ` s0), ((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0))∧ s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2)))
  syl2an((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0)), s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2), (hs0 ` s0)∈ ℝ, (hs0 : ℝ → ℝ), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  ffvelrn(hs0, cr, cr, s0)
  sseldi((c0 ` s0), cxr, (0[[,]]+∞), ((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0))∧ s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2)))
  syl2an((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0)), s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2), (c0 ` s0)∈(0[[,]]+∞), (c0 : ℝ →(0[[,]]+∞)), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  ffvelrn(c0, cr, (0[[,]]+∞), s0)
  sseldi((c1 ` s0), cxr, (0[[,]]+∞), ((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0))∧ s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2)))
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  syl2an((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0)), s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2), (c1 ` s0)∈(0[[,]]+∞), (c1 : ℝ →(0[[,]]+∞)), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0), (c1 : ℝ →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  ffvelrn(c1, cr, (0[[,]]+∞), s0)
  sylan2((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0)), s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2), (hs0 ` s0)[≤](c0 ` s0), s0 ∈ ℝ)
  eldifi(s0, cr, c2)
  r19.21bi(s0, cr, (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0)), (hs0 ` s0)[≤](c0 ` s0))
  mpbid((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0)), ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ,(hs0 ` s0)[≤](c0 ` s0)), hs0[oR(≤)]c0)
  simprr(w0, hs0 ∈ dom(S.1), hs0[oR(≤)]c0)
  ofrfval(s0, hs0, cle, c0, cr, (hs0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0), cr, cr, universe, universe, (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0)))
  ffnd(hs0, cr, cr, (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0)))
  ad2antrl(w0, hs0 ∈ dom(S.1), hs0[oR(≤)]c0, (hs0 : ℝ → ℝ))
  i1ff(hs0)
  ffnd(c0, cr, (0[[,]]+∞), (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0)))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0), (c0 : ℝ →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  a1i((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0)), ℝ ∈ 𝕌)
  reex()
  inidm(cr)
  eqidd((hs0 ` s0), ((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0))∧ s0 ∈ ℝ))
  eqidd((c0 ` s0), ((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0))∧ s0 ∈ ℝ))
  adantlr(w0, (hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0), s0 ∈(ℝ \ c2), (c0 ` s0)[≤](c1 ` s0))
  syl2anc(w0, ((S.2 ` c0)[≤](S.2 ` c1)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ dom(S.1),(hs0[oR(≤)]c0 →(S.1 ` hs0)[≤](S.2 ` c1)))), (c0 : ℝ →(0[[,]]+∞)), (S.2 ` c1)∈ ℝ*)
  syl(w0, (S.2 ` c1)∈ ℝ*, (c1 : ℝ →(0[[,]]+∞)))
  itg2cl(c1)
  itg2leub(hs0, c0, (S.2 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, (hs0 ∈ dom(S.1)∧ hs0[oR(≤)]c0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 ∈ dom(S.1), hs0[oR(≤)]c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, dom(S.1))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, citg1)
  diff.citg1.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, hs0, oR(≤), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cofr.s(s0, cle)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((S.2 ` c1))
}

blocks.name: itg2eqa
blocks.content: Approximate equality of integrals. If ` F = G ` for almost all ` x ` , then ` S.2 F = S.2 G ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2eqa(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), cfv(citg2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c2), nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  xrletrid(cfv(citg2, c0), cfv(citg2, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c0), cxr), wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  itg2cl(c0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c1), cxr), wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  itg2cl(c1)
  itg2lea(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  breqtrd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  itg2lea(s0, c1, c0, c2, w0)
  eqbrtrrd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  xrleidd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  sseldi(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  eldifi(cv(s0), cr, c2)
  ffvelrn(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cv(s0))
}

  itg2ub(c1, co(cxp(cr, csn(co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), cof(cmul), cv(hs0)))
  3bitr4d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), co(cxp(cr, csn(c0)), cof(cmul), c1)), wbr(co(cxp(cr, csn(co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), cof(cmul), cv(hs0)), cofr(cle), c1), wral(hs1, cr, wbr(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cle, co(c0, cmul, cfv(c1, cv(hs1))))), wral(hs1, cr, wbr(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cmul, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cle, cfv(c1, cv(hs1)))))

blocks.content: The integral of a nonnegative constant times a function is the constant times the integral of the original function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: itg2split
blocks.content: The ` S.2 ` integral splits under an almost disjoint union. (The proof avoids the use of ~ itg2add which requires CC.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2split(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), co(cfv(citg2, c1), caddc, cfv(citg2, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cin(c3, c4)), nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cun(c3, c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c6, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c6, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c6, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c4))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c6, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c5))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c1), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c2), cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  xrletrid(cfv(citg2, c0), co(cfv(citg2, c1), caddc, cfv(citg2, c2)), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c0), cxr), wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  itg2cl(c0)
  rexrd(co(cfv(citg2, c1), caddc, cfv(citg2, c2)), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wbr(co(cfv(citg2, c1), caddc, cfv(citg2, c2)), cle, cfv(citg2, c0)), wbr(cfv(citg2, c1), cle, co(cfv(citg2, c0), cmin, cfv(citg2, c2))))
  mpbird(w0, wbr(cfv(citg2, c1), cle, co(cfv(citg2, c0), cmin, cfv(citg2, c2))), wral(hs0, cdm(citg1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c1), wbr(cfv(citg1, cv(hs0)), cle, co(cfv(citg2, c0), cmin, cfv(citg2, c2))))))

  lesubd(cfv(citg1, cv(hs0)), cfv(citg2, c0), cfv(citg2, c2), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c1))))

  expr(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cofr(cle), c2), wbr(cfv(citg1, cv(hs1)), cle, co(cfv(citg2, c0), cmin, cfv(citg1, cv(hs0)))))

blocks.name: itg2monolem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ itg2mono . We show that for any constant ` t ` less than one, ` t x. S.1 H ` is less than ` S ` , and so ` S.1 H <_ S ` , which is one half of the equality in ~ itg2mono . Consider the sequence ` A ( n ) = { x | t x. H <_ F ( n ) } ` . This is an increasing sequence of measurable sets whose union is ` RR ` , and so ` H |`` A ( n ) ` has an integral which equals ` S.1 H ` in the limit, by ~ itg1climres . Then by taking the limit in ` ( t x. H ) |`` A ( n ) <_ F ( n ) ` , we get ` t x. S.1 H <_ S ` as desired. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: itg2monolem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ itg2mono . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2monolem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0)))), cr, clt)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cmbf))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wf(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cn)), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, nat1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wrex(s2, cr, wral(s1, cn, wbr(cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cv(s0)), cle, cv(s2)))))
  -| wceq(c0, csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(citg2, cfv(c2, cv(s1))))), cxr, clt))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cdm(citg1)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cofr(cle), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wbr(cfv(citg1, c3), cle, c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

blocks.name: itg2mono
blocks.content: The Monotone Convergence Theorem for nonnegative functions. If ` { ( F `` n ) : n e. NN } ` is a monotone increasing sequence of positive, measurable, real-valued functions, and ` G ` is the pointwise limit of the sequence, then ` ( S.2 `` G ) ` is the limit of the sequence ` { ( S.2 `` ( F `` n ) ) : n e. NN } ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2mono(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), c1))

thm itg2i1fseqle(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ ℕ)→(c1 ` c0)[oR(≤)]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ MblFn)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : ℝ →(0[[,)]+∞)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : ℕ → dom(S.1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ,(0p[oR(≤)](c1 ` s0)∧(c1 ` s0)[oR(≤)](c1 `(s0[+]1)))))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c1 ` s0)` s1))[~~>](c2 ` s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ ℕ)→(c1 ` c0)[oR(≤)]c2), (w0 → c2 ∈ MblFn))
  a1ii(((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ ℕ)→(c1 ` c0)[oR(≤)]c2), d(s0, c2))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ ℕ), (c1 ` c0)[oR(≤)]c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ,((c1 ` c0)` hs0)[≤](c2 ` hs0)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cr, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ ℕ), ((c1 ` c0)` hs0)[≤](c2 ` hs0))
  eqbrtrrd(((c1 ` c0)` hs0), cle, (c2 ` hs0), ((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c1 ` s0)` hs0))` c0), ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ))
  ad2antlr(w0, c0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℝ, ((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c1 ` s0)` hs0))` c0)=((c1 ` c0)` hs0))
  fvmpt(s0, c0, cn, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c1 ` s0)` hs0)), ((c1 ` c0)` hs0), ((c1 ` s0)` hs0))
  fveq1d((c1 ` s0), hs0, (c1 ` c0), s0 = c0)
  fveq2(s0, c0, c1)
  fvex((c1 ` c0), hs0)

  nnuz()
  simplr(w0, c0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℝ)

  sylan(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c1 ` s0)` hs0))[~~>](c2 ` hs0), ∀(s1 ∈ ℝ,(s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c1 ` s0)` s1))[~~>](c2 ` s1)))
  rspccva(s1, cr, hs0, (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c1 ` s0)` s1))[~~>](c2 ` s1), (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c1 ` s0)` hs0))[~~>](c2 ` hs0))
  breq12d((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c1 ` s0)` s1)), cli, (c2 ` s1), (s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c1 ` s0)` hs0)), (c2 ` hs0), s1 = hs0)
  mpteq2dv(s0, cn, ((c1 ` s0)` s1), ((c1 ` s0)` hs0), s1 = hs0)

  fveq2(s1, hs0, c2)
  adantllr(w0, c0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℕ, ((s0 ∈ ℕ ↦((c1 ` s0)` hs0))` hs1)∈ ℝ)

blocks.name: itg2i1fseq
blocks.content: Subject to the conditions coming from ~ mbfi1fseq , the integral of the sequence of simple functions converges to the integral of the target function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: itg2i1fseq2
blocks.content: In an extension to the results of ~ itg2i1fseq , if there is an upper bound on the integrals of the simple functions approaching ` F ` , then ` S.2 F ` is real and the standard limit relation applies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, cr, wbr(cmpt(s0, cn, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cli, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))

blocks.content: Special case of ~ itg2i1fseq2 : if the integral of ` F ` is a real number, then the standard limit relation holds on the integrals of simple functions approaching ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)

thm itg2i1fseq3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(citg2, c1)))

  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0p, cofr(cle), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, cr, wbr(cmpt(s0, cn, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cli, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, cn, cfv(citg1, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c1), cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  itg2i1fseq2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, c0, c1, c2, cfv(citg2, c1), w0)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wbr(cfv(citg1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)), wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cofr(cle), c1))

  icossicc(nat0, cpnf)
  fss(c1, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), cn, c2, cdm(citg1), w0)

  itg2ub(c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))

  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)

blocks.name: itg2add
blocks.content: The ` S.2 ` integral is linear. (Measurability is an essential component of this theorem; otherwise consider the characteristic function of a nonmeasurable set and its complement.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: itg2gt0
blocks.content: If the function ` F ` is strictly positive on a set of positive measure, then the integral of the function is positive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2gt0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(citg2, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(cvol, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mt4d(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(citg2, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(cvol, c1)))
  sylibd(w0, wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(citg2, c0))), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(cvol, c1))), wbr(cfv(cvol, c1), cle, nat0))
  ex(w0, wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(citg2, c0))), wbr(cfv(cvol, c1), cle, nat0))
  xrletrd(cfv(cvol, c1), nat0, cfv(covol, cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf)))))), wa(w0, wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(citg2, c0)))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(citg2, c0))), wcel(cfv(cvol, c1), cxr))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(citg2, c0))), wcel(cfv(covol, cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf)))))), cxr))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(covol, cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf)))))), cxr), wss(cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf))))), cr))
  ovolcl(cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf))))))
  a1i(wa(w0, wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(citg2, c0)))), wcel(nat0, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(citg2, c0))), wbr(cfv(cvol, c1), cle, cfv(covol, cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf))))))))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cvol, c1), cle, cfv(covol, cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf)))))), cfv(covol, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cvol, c1), cfv(covol, c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(cvol)))
  mblvol(c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(cfv(covol, c1), cle, cfv(covol, cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf))))))), wss(c1, cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf)))))), wss(cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf))))), cr))
  ssrdv(s0, c1, cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf))))), w0)
  sylibrd(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(crn(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf)))))), wrex(hs1, cn, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf))), cv(hs1)))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(hs1, cn, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf))), cv(hs1)))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wrex(hs1, cn, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, cima(ccnv(c0), co(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cioo, cpnf))), cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs1, cn, wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs1)), clt, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))

blocks.name: itg2cn
blocks.content: A sort of absolute continuity of the Lebesgue integral (this is the core of ~ ftc1a which is about actual absolute continuity). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, crp, wral(s1, cdm(cvol), wi(wbr(cfv(cvol, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s2, cr, cif(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), nat0, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), clt, c1))))), diffss(s0, s2))

  rexlimddv(hs0, cn, w0, wrex(s0, crp, wral(s1, cdm(cvol), wi(wbr(cfv(cvol, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s2, cr, cif(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), nat0, wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))), clt, c1)))), wn(wbr(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s2, cr, cif(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), nat0, wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cle, cv(hs0))))), cle, co(cfv(citg2, c0), cmin, co(c1, cdiv, nat2)))))

blocks.name: ibllem
blocks.content: Conditioned equality theorem for the if statement. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: isibl
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is integrable". The "integrable" predicate corresponds roughly to the range of validity of ` S. A B _d x ` , which is to say that the expression ` S. A B _d x ` doesn't make sense unless ` ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: isibl2
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is integrable" when ` F ` is a mapping operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isibl2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wral(s1, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), wcel(cfv(citg2, c2), cr)))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c3, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c3))))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c3, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {

blocks.name: iblmbf
blocks.content: An integrable function is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm iblmbf(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cibl), wcel(c0, cmbf))
} = {
  sseli(c0, cibl, cmbf)
  ssrab3(hs2, cibl, cmbf, wral(hs3, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(hs0, cr, csb(hs1, cfv(cre, co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)), cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs3)))), cif(cv(hs1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(cv(hs2))), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs1))))))), cr)))
  df-ibl(hs2, hs3, hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(cmbf)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iblmbf(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ L^1 → c0 ∈ MblFn)
} = {
  sseli(c0, cibl, cmbf)
  ssrab3(hs2, cibl, cmbf, ∀(hs3 ∈(0[...]3),(S.2 `(hs0 ∈ ℝ ↦[(Re `((hs2 ` hs0)[÷](i[^]hs3)))/ hs1]if((hs0 ∈ dom(hs2)∧ 0[≤]hs1), hs1, 0)))∈ ℝ))
  df-ibl(hs2, hs3, hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(cmbf)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.content: Evaluate the class substitution in ~ df-itg . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfitg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c2, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  eqtri(citg(s0, c0, c1), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c2, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))))))), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, csb(hs0, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))), cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0))))))))))
  df-itg(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  sumeq2i(s1, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, csb(hs0, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))), cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0)))))))), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c2, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)))))))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, nat3)), wceq(co(co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, csb(hs0, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))), cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0)))))))), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c2, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))))))))
  oveq2i(co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, csb(hs0, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))), cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0))))))), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c2, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))))))
  fveq2i(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, csb(hs0, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))), cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0)))))), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c2, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)))))
  mpteq2i(s0, cr, csb(hs0, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))), cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0))))), cif(c2, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))))
  csbie(hs0, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))), cif(cv(hs0), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0)))), cif(c2, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))))
  fvex(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1))))
  ifbieq1d(cv(hs0), nat0, c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, cv(hs0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  syl6eqr(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1))))))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfz, nat3)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.nat3.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cif(c2, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))))
}

thm itgex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  eqeltri(citg(s0, c0, c1), universe, csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, csb(hs1, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), cif(cv(hs1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs1))))))))))
  df-itg(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1)
  sumex(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, csb(hs1, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), cif(cv(hs1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs1)))))))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm itgex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  eqeltri(S.(c0, c1, s0), universe, sum(hs0 ∈(0[...]3),((i[^]hs0)[×](S.2 `(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦[(Re `(c1[÷](i[^]hs0)))/ hs1]if((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ 0[≤]hs1), hs1, 0))))))

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

}

  fveq2d(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))), wceq(c0, c1))
  sylancr(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), wceq(cr, cr), wral(s0, cr, wceq(cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))), cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))))
  eqid(cr)
  ralrimi(s0, cr, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))), cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))))

  a1d(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wceq(cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))), cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))))

  anbi1d(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eleq2(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  mpteq12(s0, cr, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))), cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))
  dfitg(s0, hs0, c0, c2, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  dfitg(s0, hs0, c1, c2, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  eqid(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cfz, nat3))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  nffv(s0, citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, csb(hs1, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), cif(cv(hs1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs1)))))))
  nfcv(s0, citg2)
  nfmpt1(s0, cr, csb(hs1, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), cif(cv(hs1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs1))))))

  diff.nat3.s(s0)

  diff.cexp.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

thm nfitg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, citg(s1, c0, c1), csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s1, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))))))
  dfitg(s1, hs0, c0, c1, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  eqid(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  nfsum(s0, hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s1, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))))))
  nfcv(s0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3))
  nfov(s0, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s1, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))))
  nfcv(s0, cmul)
  nffv(s0, citg2, cmpt(s1, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))))

blocks.name: itgmpt
blocks.content: Change bound variable in an integral. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  syl5req(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1))), citg(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0))), w0)
  cbvitg(s1, s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(s1), cv(s0), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  nffvmpt1(s0, c0, c1, cv(s1))
  nfcv(s1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)))
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))

thm itgre(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  itgcnval(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  crred(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), w0)

  recld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simpld(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl))
  itgrecl(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1), w0)
  imcld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simprd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))

thm itgre(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(Re ` S.(c0, c1, s0))= S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((Re ` S.(c0, c1, s0)), S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0), (Re `(S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0)[+](i[×]S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0)))), w0)
  fveq2d(cre, S.(c0, c1, s0), (S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0)[+](i[×]S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0))), w0)
  itgcnval(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  crred(S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0), S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0), w0)
  itgrecl(s0, c0, (Re ` c1), w0)
  recld(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  simpld(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1))∈ L^1, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1))∈ L^1)
  itgrecl(s0, c0, (Im ` c1), w0)
  imcld(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  simprd(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1))∈ L^1, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1))∈ L^1)
  mpbid(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Re ` c1))∈ L^1 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(Im ` c1))∈ L^1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  iblcn(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
}

blocks.name: itgim
blocks.content: Imaginary part of an integral. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgim(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cim, citg(s0, c0, c1)), citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cim, citg(s0, c0, c1)), citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cfv(cim, co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))))), w0)
  fveq2d(cim, citg(s0, c0, c1), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)))), w0)
  itgcnval(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  crimd(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), w0)
  itgrecl(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1), w0)
  recld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simpld(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl))
  itgrecl(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1), w0)
  imcld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simprd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblcn(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: iblneg
blocks.content: The negative of an integrable function is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)

  ifbieq1d(cfv(cre, cneg(c1)), nat0, cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))))

  eqtrd(cneg(cfv(cre, cneg(c1))), cfv(cre, c1), cneg(cneg(cfv(cre, c1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  negeqd(cfv(cre, cneg(c1)), cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  renegd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

  iblre(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1), w0)
  recld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

  ifbieq1d(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), nat0, cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, cneg(c1))), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, c1))))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simprd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, c1))))), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1)))), cibl))
  eqeltrd(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1))), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)))))), cibl, cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1)))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1))), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1))))), cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1))), w0)
  ifbieq1d(cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1))), nat0, cfv(cim, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1)))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1))), cfv(cim, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqtrd(cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1))), cfv(cim, c1), cneg(cneg(cfv(cim, c1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  negeqd(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  imnegd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  negnegd(cfv(cim, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(cfv(cim, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simpld(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1)))), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, c1))))), cibl))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1)))), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, c1))))), cibl)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl))
  simprd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))

  itgcl(s0, c0, cif(cfv(cre, c1), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, c1))), cr, w0)
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cif(cfv(cre, c1), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, c1))), cr), wcel(cfv(cre, c1), cr), wcel(nat0, cr))

blocks.name: iblss
blocks.content: A subset of an integrable function is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: itgitg2
blocks.content: Transfer an integral using ` S.2 ` to an equivalent integral using ` S. ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgitg2(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, cr, c0), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, c0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cibl))
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(citg(s0, cr, c0), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, c0)), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))), w0)
  itgposval(s0, cr, c0, w0)
  fveq2i(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cr))), cmpt(s0, cr, c0))
  mpteq2ia(s0, cr, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), c0)
  iftrue(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm itgitg2(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → S.(ℝ, c0, s0)=(S.2 `(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ c0)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)→ c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)→ 0[≤]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ c0)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(S.(ℝ, c0, s0), (S.2 `(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ c0)), (S.2 `(s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ ℝ, c0, 0))), w0)
  itgposval(s0, cr, c0, w0)
  fveq2i(citg2, (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ ℝ, c0, 0)), (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ c0))
  mpteq2ia(s0, cr, if(s0 ∈ ℝ, c0, 0), c0)
  iftrue(c0, nat0, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

  eqeltrd(cfv(citg2, cmpt(hs0, cr, cif(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))), cr, cfv(citg1, cmpt(hs0, cr, cif(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)))

blocks.name: itgge0
blocks.content: The integral of a positive function is positive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, citg(s0, c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqbrr(nat0, cle, citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c0, nat0), w0)
  itgz(s0, c0)
  itgle(s0, c0, nat0, c1, w0)
  syl5eqelr(cmpt(s0, c0, nat0), cibl, cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), w0)
  fconstmpt(s0, c0, nat0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cibl), wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
  mbfdm2(s0, c0, c1, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  ibl0(c0)
  0red(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm itgge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → 0[≤]S.(c0, c1, s0))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ 0[≤]c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqbrr(nat0, cle, S.(c0, c1, s0), S.(c0, 0, s0), w0)
  itgz(s0, c0)
  itgle(s0, c0, nat0, c1, w0)
  syl5eqelr((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ 0), cibl, (c0 × { 0 }), w0)
  fconstmpt(s0, c0, nat0)
  syl(w0, (c0 × { 0 })∈ L^1, c0 ∈ dom(vol))
  mbfdm2(s0, c0, c1, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  ibl0(c0)
  0red((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: itgss2
blocks.content: Expand the set of an integral by adding zeroes outside the domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(citg(s0, c0, c2), citg(s0, c1, cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtr3d(citg(s0, c0, c2), citg(s0, c1, cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), citg(s0, c0, cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wss(c0, c1))
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c2, wss(c0, c1))
  adantl(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c2))
  iftrue(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  itgss(s0, c0, cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c1, wss(c0, c1))
  id(wss(c0, c1))
  adantl(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c0)), wceq(cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), nat0))
  iffalsed(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eldifn(cv(s0), c1, c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm itgss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 → S.(c0, c2, s0)= S.(c1, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0), s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtr3d(S.(c0, c2, s0), S.(c1, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0), s0), S.(c0, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0), s0), c0 ⊆ c1)
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0), c2, c0 ⊆ c1)
  adantl(c0 ⊆ c1, s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)= c2)
  iftrue(c2, nat0, s0 ∈ c0)
  itgss(s0, c0, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0), c1, c0 ⊆ c1)
  id(c0 ⊆ c1)
  adantl(c0 ⊆ c1, s0 ∈(c1 \ c0), if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)= 0)
  iffalsed(c2, nat0, s0 ∈(c1 \ c0), s0 ∈ c0)
  eldifn(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: itgeqa
blocks.content: Approximate equality of integrals. If ` C ( x ) = D ( x ) ` for almost all ` x ` , then ` S. B C ( x ) _d x = S. B D ( x ) _d x ` and one is integrable iff the other is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: itgss3
blocks.content: Expand the set of an integral by a nullset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)

thm itgioo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), citg(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), c2)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  simprd(w0, wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), citg(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), c2)), wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), c2), cibl)))

  biimpar(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0), wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), emptycls))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))

  0dif(co(c0, cioo, c1))

  syl5req(co(c0, cicc, c1), cun(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  uncom(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1))

  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cxr))

thm itgless(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(citg(s0, c0, c1), cle, citg(s0, c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqbrtrd(citg(s0, c0, c1), cle, citg(s0, c2, c1), citg(s0, c2, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))), wss(c0, c2))
  itgss2(s0, c0, c2, c1)
  itgle(s0, c2, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c1, w0)
  iblss2(s0, c2, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c0, cr, w0)
  mbfdm2(s0, c2, c1, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  sselda(cv(s0), c0, c2, w0)
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eldifn(cv(s0), c2, c0)
  syl5eqel(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), cibl, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)

thm itgless(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → S.(c0, c1, s0)[≤]S.(c2, c1, s0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c2)

  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ 0[≤]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqbrtrd(S.(c0, c1, s0), cle, S.(c2, c1, s0), S.(c2, if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0), s0), w0)

  iblss2(s0, c2, if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0), c0, cr, w0)
  mbfdm2(s0, c2, c1, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)

  sylancl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, 0 ∈ ℝ)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c2)
  sselda(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c2 \ c0)), s0 ∈ c0)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈(c2 \ c0), ¬ s0 ∈ c0)

  syl5eqel((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0)), cibl, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), w0)
  mpteq2ia(s0, c0, if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0), c1)
  iftrue(c1, nat0, s0 ∈ c0)
  iblss(s0, c0, c1, c2, cr, w0)
  sylancl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, 0 ∈ ℝ)
  0re()
  ifcl(c1, cr, nat0, s0 ∈ c0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0)[≤]c1, c1[≤]c1, 0[≤]c1)
  leidd(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  ifboth(c1, nat0, c1[≤]c1, 0[≤]c1, if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0)[≤]c1, s0 ∈ c0)
  breq1(c1, if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0), cle, c1)
  breq1(nat0, if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0), cle, c1)

blocks.name: ibladd
blocks.content: Add two integrals over the same domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ibladd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, c2)), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  ovexd(c1, caddc, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)

blocks.name: iblsub
blocks.content: Subtract two integrals over the same domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm iblsub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cibl, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  ibladd(s0, c0, c1, cneg(c2), cc, w0)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  negcld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  iblneg(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iblsub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[-]c2))∈ L^1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[-]c2)), cibl, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[+]-u(c2))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, (c1[+]-u(c2)), (c1[-]c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  ibladd(s0, c0, c1, -u(c2), cc, w0)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  negcld(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))
  iblneg(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: itgadd
blocks.content: Add two integrals over the same domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgadd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, citg(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(citg(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, citg(s0, c0, c2)), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, co(c1, caddc, c2))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, co(c1, caddc, c2))))), co(co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)))), caddc, co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2))))), w0)

  oveq12d(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, co(c1, caddc, c2))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, co(c1, caddc, c2)))), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2))), co(co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)))), w0)

  eqtrd(co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, co(c1, caddc, c2)))), co(co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)))), co(ci, cmul, co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), caddc, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)))), w0)

  simprd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl))

blocks.name: itgsub
blocks.content: Subtract two integrals over the same domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgsub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), cmin, citg(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(citg(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), cmin, citg(s0, c0, c2)), citg(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, cneg(citg(s0, c0, c2))), w0)
  eqtr4d(citg(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, cneg(citg(s0, c0, c2))), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, citg(s0, c0, cneg(c2))), w0)
  itgadd(s0, c0, c1, cneg(c2), cc, w0)
  negcld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  iblneg(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  oveq2d(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, cneg(citg(s0, c0, c2)), citg(s0, c0, cneg(c2)), w0)
  itgneg(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  negsubd(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  itgcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  itgcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm itgsub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → S.(c0,(c1[-]c2), s0)=(S.(c0, c1, s0)[-]S.(c0, c2, s0)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(S.(c0,(c1[-]c2), s0), (S.(c0, c1, s0)[-]S.(c0, c2, s0)), S.(c0,(c1[+]-u(c2)), s0), (S.(c0, c1, s0)[+]-u(S.(c0, c2, s0))), w0)
  eqtr4d(S.(c0,(c1[+]-u(c2)), s0), (S.(c0, c1, s0)[+]-u(S.(c0, c2, s0))), (S.(c0, c1, s0)[+]S.(c0, -u(c2), s0)), w0)
  itgadd(s0, c0, c1, -u(c2), cc, w0)
  negcld(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  iblneg(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  oveq2d(S.(c0, c1, s0), caddc, -u(S.(c0, c2, s0)), S.(c0, -u(c2), s0), w0)
  itgneg(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, (c1[+]-u(c2)), (c1[-]c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ MblFn, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2))
  negsubd(S.(c0, c1, s0), S.(c0, c2, s0), w0)
  itgcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  itgcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: itgfsum

thm itgfsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, citg(s0, c0, c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpi(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, citg(s0, c0, c2)))), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)
  mpcom(w0, wi(wss(c1, c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, citg(s0, c0, c2))))), wcel(c1, cfn))
  findcard2s(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, wi(w0, wi(wss(c1, c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, citg(s0, c0, c2)))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(emptycls, c1), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cibl))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs1), citg(s0, c0, c2)))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c2)), csu(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), citg(s0, c0, c2)))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2))))), wi(wss(emptycls, c1), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cibl)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)))), wss(emptycls, c1), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cibl))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), emptycls, c1)
  mpbiran2d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)))), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2))))

  itgz(s0, c0)

  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2), nat0))
  syl6eq(csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)), nat0, csu(s1, emptycls, citg(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sumeq1(s1, cv(hs0), emptycls, citg(s0, c0, c2))

  eleq1d(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl, cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  syl6eqr(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cmpt(s0, c0, nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  mpteq2dv(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2), nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  syl6eq(csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2), nat0, csu(s1, emptycls, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sumeq1(s1, cv(hs0), emptycls, c2)
  sum0(s1, c2)
  fconstmpt(s0, c0, nat0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2))))), wi(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs1), citg(s0, c0, c2))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)))), wss(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs1), citg(s0, c0, c2)))))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs1), citg(s0, c0, c2))))
  eleq1d(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl, cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  mpteq2dv(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  eqeq12d(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)), citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs1), citg(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)))

blocks.name: iblabslem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ iblabs . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm iblabslem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(citg2, c0), cr)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cibl))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, c2)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c4, c2)), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c4, c2), cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(citg2, c0), cr))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c3)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(citg2, c0), cr))), wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cibl)))
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(citg2, c0), cr))
  syl5eqel(c0, cmbf, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, c2)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), w0)
  mbfss(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, c2)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), c1, cr, w0)
  eqeltrd(cif(cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, c2)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), cr, cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, c2)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  abscld(cfv(c4, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c1))), wceq(cif(cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, c2)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), nat0), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  eqeltrd(cmpt(s0, c1, cif(cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, c2)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), cmbf, ccom(cabs, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c4, c2))), w0)
  syl6reqr(cmpt(s0, c1, cif(cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, c2)), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))), ccom(cabs, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c4, c2))), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, c2))), w0)
  cofmpt(s0, cabs, c1, cfv(c4, c2), cc, cr, w0)

blocks.name: iblabsr
blocks.content: A measurable function is integrable iff its absolute value is integrable. (See ~ iblabs for the forward implication.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)

  recnd(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, nat3))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, nat3)), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  elfzelz(cv(hs0), nat0, nat3)
  iblitg(s0, cv(hs0), cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))), c3, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), c1, c4, w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sselda(cv(s0), c3, c0, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c3, c0, cun(c2, c3), w0)
  ssun2(c3, c2)
  dfitg(s0, hs0, c0, c1, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  oveq12i(citg(s0, c2, c1), caddc, citg(s0, c3, c1), csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))))), csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), co(co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)), cmul, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))))))
  dfitg(s0, hs0, c2, c1, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  dfitg(s0, hs0, c3, c1, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))
  eqid(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))

  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, nat3)))

blocks.name: itgspliticc
blocks.content: The ` S. ` integral splits on closed intervals with matching endpoints. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgspliticc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cicc, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cicc, c1), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cicc, c1))), wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cicc, c3), c2), cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c3, cicc, c1), c2), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  itgsplit(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), c2, co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1), c4, w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(covol, cin(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1))), nat0, cfv(covol, csn(c3)), w0)
  fveq2d(covol, cin(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1)), csn(c3), w0)
  3eqtrd(cin(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1)), csn(c3), co(cif(c3, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)), cicc, cif(c3, c1, wbr(c3, cle, c1))), co(c3, cicc, c3), w0)
  syl22anc(w0, wceq(cin(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1)), co(cif(c3, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)), cicc, cif(c3, c1, wbr(c3, cle, c1)))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexrd(c0, w0)
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  ixxin(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c3, c3, c1, cicc, cle, cle)
  df-icc(s0, hs0, hs1)
  xrmaxle(c0, c3, cv(hs1))
  xrlemin(cv(hs1), c3, c1)
  oveq12d(cif(c3, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)), cicc, cif(c3, c1, wbr(c3, cle, c1)), c3, c3, w0)
  iftrued(c3, c0, w0, wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  simp2d(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c3), wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  iftrued(c3, c1, w0, wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  simp3d(w0, wbr(c3, cle, c1), wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c3, cicc, c3), csn(c3)), wcel(c3, cxr))
  rexrd(c3, w0)
  iccid(c3)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, csn(c3)), nat0), wcel(c3, cr))
  simp1d(w0, wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  elicc2(c0, c1, c3)
  ovolsn(c3)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), cun(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  iccsplit(c0, c1, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cicc, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cicc, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cicc, c1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cle)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm itgspliticc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → S.((c0[[,]]c1), c2, s0)=(S.((c0[[,]]c3), c2, s0)[+]S.((c3[[,]]c1), c2, s0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(c0[[,]]c1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c1))→ c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈(c0[[,]]c3)↦ c2)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈(c3[[,]]c1)↦ c2)∈ L^1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  itgsplit(s0, (c0[[,]]c1), c2, (c0[[,]]c3), (c3[[,]]c1), c4, w0)
  eqtrd((vol* `((c0[[,]]c3)⋂(c3[[,]]c1))), nat0, (vol* ` { c3 }), w0)
  fveq2d(covol, ((c0[[,]]c3)⋂(c3[[,]]c1)), { c3 }, w0)
  3eqtrd(((c0[[,]]c3)⋂(c3[[,]]c1)), { c3 }, (if(c0[≤]c3, c3, c0)[[,]]if(c3[≤]c1, c3, c1)), (c3[[,]]c3), w0)
  syl22anc(w0, ((c0[[,]]c3)⋂(c3[[,]]c1))=(if(c0[≤]c3, c3, c0)[[,]]if(c3[≤]c1, c3, c1)), c0 ∈ ℝ*, c3 ∈ ℝ*, c3 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexrd(c0, w0)
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  ixxin(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c3, c3, c1, cicc, cle, cle)
  df-icc(s0, hs0, hs1)
  xrmaxle(c0, c3, hs1)
  xrlemin(hs1, c3, c1)
  oveq12d(if(c0[≤]c3, c3, c0), cicc, if(c3[≤]c1, c3, c1), c3, c3, w0)
  iftrued(c3, c0, w0, c0[≤]c3)
  simp2d(w0, c0[≤]c3, c3 ∈ ℝ, c3[≤]c1)
  iftrued(c3, c1, w0, c3[≤]c1)
  simp3d(w0, c3[≤]c1, c3 ∈ ℝ, c0[≤]c3)
  syl(w0, (c3[[,]]c3)= { c3 }, c3 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexrd(c3, w0)
  iccid(c3)
  syl(w0, (vol* ` { c3 })= 0, c3 ∈ ℝ)
  simp1d(w0, c3 ∈ ℝ, c0[≤]c3, c3[≤]c1)
  mpbid(w0, (c3 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[≤]c3 ∧ c3[≤]c1), c3 ∈(c0[[,]]c1))
  syl2anc(w0, (c3 ∈(c0[[,]]c1)↔(c3 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[≤]c3 ∧ c3[≤]c1)), c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  elicc2(c0, c1, c3)
  ovolsn(c3)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[[,]]c1)=((c0[[,]]c3)⋃(c3[[,]]c1)), c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c3 ∈(c0[[,]]c1))
  iccsplit(c0, c1, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cicc, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cicc, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cicc, c1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cle)
}

blocks.name: itgsplitioo
blocks.content: The ` S. ` integral splits on open intervals with matching endpoints. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgsplitioo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  ecased(w0, wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))
  syld(w0, wn(wbr(c0, clt, c3)), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))), wceq(c0, c3))
  ord(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c3), wceq(c0, c3))
  mpbid(w0, wo(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wceq(c0, c3)), wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  leloed(c0, c3, w0)
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(c0, c3), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))), wceq(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), co(nat0, caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))))
  eqcomd(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), co(nat0, caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), w0)
  addid2d(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), w0)
  itgcl(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2, cc, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cioo, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c1)))
  sselda(cv(s0), co(c3, cioo, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c3, cioo, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  simp2d(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c3), wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  iooss1(c0, c3, c1)
  eqeq12d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), co(nat0, caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), wceq(c0, c3))
  syl(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c3, cioo, c1)))
  oveq1(c0, c3, cioo, c1)
  itgeq1(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)
  oveq1d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), nat0, wceq(c0, c3))
  syl6eq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), nat0, citg(s0, emptycls, c2), wceq(c0, c3))
  syl(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), citg(s0, emptycls, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c3), emptycls))
  syl6eq(co(c0, cioo, c3), emptycls, co(c3, cioo, c3), wceq(c0, c3))
  oveq1(c0, c3, cioo, c3)
  itgeq1(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), emptycls, c2)
  syld(w0, wn(wbr(c3, clt, c1)), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))), wceq(c3, c1))
  ord(w0, wbr(c3, clt, c1), wceq(c3, c1))
  mpbid(w0, wo(wbr(c3, clt, c1), wceq(c3, c1)), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  leloed(c3, c1, w0)
  syl5ibcom(w0, wceq(c3, c1), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, nat0)))
  eqcomd(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, nat0), w0)
  addid1d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), w0)
  itgcl(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2, cc, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c3)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c1)))
  sselda(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c0, cioo, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c0, cioo, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  simp3d(w0, wbr(c3, cle, c1), wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  iooss2(c1, c3, c0)
  eqeq12d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, nat0), citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), wceq(c3, c1))
  syl(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2)), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c0, cioo, c1)))
  oveq2(c3, c1, c0, cioo)
  itgeq1(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c0, cioo, c1), c2)
  oveq2d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, nat0, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), wceq(c3, c1))
  syl5eqr(nat0, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), citg(s0, emptycls, c2), wceq(c3, c1))
  itg0(s0, c2)
  syl(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(citg(s0, emptycls, c2), citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), wceq(emptycls, co(c3, cioo, c1)))
  syl5eqr(emptycls, co(c3, cioo, c1), co(c3, cioo, c3), wceq(c3, c1))
  iooid(c3)
  oveq2(c3, c1, c3, cioo)
  itgeq1(s0, emptycls, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)
  ex(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1)), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))))

blocks.name: bddmulibl
blocks.content: A bounded function times an integrable function is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: bddibl
blocks.content: A bounded function is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
