thm bddibl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cibl))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, cibl, co(c0, cof(cmul), cxp(cdm(c0), csn(nat1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))))
  offveq(hs0, c0, cmul, cxp(cdm(c0), csn(nat1)), c0, cdm(c0), cdm(cvol), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), nat1, w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))), wfn(cxp(cdm(c0), csn(nat1)), cdm(c0)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  fnconstg(nat1, cc, cdm(c0))
  ffnd(c0, cdm(c0), cc, w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))))
  eqidd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wceq(cfv(cxp(cdm(c0), csn(nat1)), cv(hs0)), nat1))
  fvconst2(cv(hs0), cdm(c0), nat1)
  1ex()
  mulid1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), cdm(c0), c0, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0)))), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cc))
  mbff(c0)
  syld3an2(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(c0, cof(cmul), cxp(cdm(c0), csn(nat1))), cibl), wcel(cxp(cdm(c0), csn(nat1)), cibl))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(cxp(cdm(c0), csn(nat1)), cibl), wcel(cdm(c0), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wcel(nat1, cc))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(cdm(c0), cdm(cvol)))
  mbfdm(c0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0)))))
  1cnd(w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))))

  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, cdm(c0), csn(nat1))
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)

thm bddibl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0)))→ c0 ∈ L^1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, cibl, (c0[oF(×)](dom(c0)× { 1 })), (c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0))))
  offveq(hs0, c0, cmul, (dom(c0)× { 1 }), c0, dom(c0), dom(vol), (c0 ` hs0), nat1, (c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0))))
  syl((c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0))), (dom(c0)× { 1 })[Fn]dom(c0), 1 ∈ ℂ)
  fnconstg(nat1, cc, dom(c0))
  ffnd(c0, dom(c0), cc, (c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0))))
  eqidd((c0 ` hs0), ((c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0)))∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)))
  adantl((c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0))), hs0 ∈ dom(c0), ((dom(c0)× { 1 })` hs0)= 1)
  fvconst2(hs0, dom(c0), nat1)
  1ex()
  mulid1d((c0 ` hs0), ((c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0)))∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)))
  ffvelrnda(hs0, dom(c0), c0, cc, (c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0))))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ MblFn, (vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0)), (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℂ))
  mbff(c0)
  syld3an2(c0 ∈ MblFn, (vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0)), (c0[oF(×)](dom(c0)× { 1 }))∈ L^1, (dom(c0)× { 1 })∈ L^1)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0))), (dom(c0)× { 1 })∈ L^1, dom(c0)∈ dom(vol), (vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ, 1 ∈ ℂ)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ MblFn, (vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0)), dom(c0)∈ dom(vol))
  mbfdm(c0)
  simp2(c0 ∈ MblFn, (vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0)))
  1cnd((c0 ∈ MblFn ∧(vol ` dom(c0))∈ ℝ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ dom(c0),(abs `(c0 ` s1))[≤]s0))))
  iblconst(dom(c0), nat1)
  bddmulibl(s0, s1, c0, (dom(c0)× { 1 }))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.nat1.s(s0)

blocks.name: cniccibl
blocks.content: A continuous function on a closed bounded interval is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm cniccibl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, co(co(c0, cicc, c1), ccncf, cc))), wcel(c2, cibl))
} = {
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, co(co(c0, cicc, c1), ccncf, cc))), wcel(c2, cibl), wcel(c2, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c2)), cr), wrex(hs1, cr, wral(hs0, cdm(c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), cle, cv(hs1)))))
  stoic3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, co(co(c0, cicc, c1), ccncf, cc)), wcel(c2, cmbf), wcel(co(c0, cicc, c1), cdm(cvol)))
  iccmbl(c0, c1)
  cnmbf(co(c0, cicc, c1), c2)

} = {

  itg2gt0(hs0, (s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0)), c0, w0)

  0e0icopnf()
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℝ \ c0)), s0 ∈ c0)

  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ((s0 ∈ ℝ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0))` s0)= if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0), s0 ∈ ℝ, if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0)∈ ℝ+)

thm itgcn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, crp, wral(s1, cdm(cvol), wi(wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cfv(cvol, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(citg(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cabs, c1)), clt, c2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s2, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, crp, wral(s1, cdm(cvol), wi(wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cfv(cvol, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(citg(s2, cv(s1), cfv(cabs, c1)), clt, c2)))), wrex(s0, crp, wral(s1, cdm(cvol), wi(wbr(cfv(cvol, cv(s1)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(citg2, cmpt(hs0, cr, cif(cfv(cmpt(s2, cr, cif(cfv(cabs, c1), nat0, wcel(cv(s2), c0))), cv(hs0)), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), clt, c2)))))
  itg2cn(s0, s1, hs0, cmpt(s2, cr, cif(cfv(cabs, c1), nat0, wcel(cv(s2), c0))), c2, w0)
  fmpttd(s2, cr, cif(cfv(cabs, c1), nat0, wcel(cv(s2), c0)), co(nat0, cico, cpnf), w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), cr), wcel(cif(cfv(cabs, c1), nat0, wcel(cv(s2), c0)), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  mbfss(s2, cr, cif(cfv(cabs, c1), nat0, wcel(cv(s2), c0)), c0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
  mbfdm2(s2, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  mblss(c0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cr, cdm(cvol)))
  rembl()
